0.title: Chapter #404

choices: Sarah
Cindy
Julia
Amy
Yumi (or other)
1.content:
You are Tom. You are whatever age your girlfriend is and look however you want to look. Your girlfriend is the real star of this story, so you don't need much of a description.


Now, who is your girlfriend?

1. Sarah: A sexy 18 year old girl. She is fairly tall (only slightly shorter than you), has long light blonde hair, a rather large bust, and a near flawless figure. She has smooth, lightly tanned skin and her muscles are slightly toned from gymnastics classes; but she is by no means a body builder. She is quite flirty with you, and enjoys teasing you when she gets the chance. Overall, she has a caring personality and would never try to hurt you. Even in the cyber-world, she typically tries to avoid harming you unless you did something to really tick her off. However, the fact that you can't actually be injured in the cyber-world means that she would probably be more willing to try some things she wouldn't otherwise do to you. You normally get along very well.

2. Cindy: An athletic 19 year old girl. She is very tall (a few inches above you), has shoulder-length hair (light brown with a single strand dyed green), and has a rather muscular build. She is a bit of a tomboy, and enjoys all kinds of sports; often wearing a sweatband over her forehead even when not working out. Due to her athletic way of life, she is fairly tanned and quite strong. She occasionally challenges you to a wrestling match, but due to her muscular physique and superior size, you rarely end up on top. Her tomboyish personality also means that she doesn't hold back if she has to fart/burp. You originally complained about this, but after being pinned down and forced to experience the stench up-close-and-personal, you learned not to argue with her about it. In fact, you actually grew to like this part of her personality over time; not only do you not have to restrain yourself around her, but she actually encourages you to "let it rip" if you have to (sometimes even making it into a contest). You now get along quite well (although your relationship isn't exactly what most people would call "romantic").

3. Julia: A seductive 20 year old girl. She just as tall as you, and has long black hair that is almost always tied into a long ponytail. She has quite a large rack, and loves to show it off. As such, she often wears some rather revealing clothes. Personality wise, she is a dominatrix. She loves the feeling of being in control of others, and is not afraid to assert herself. She loves to toy with you, using her feminine wiles to get you to do what she wants. Despite being a control freak, she still cares deeply for you and wouldn't do anything that she knew would cause you permanent harm. However, since this is all virtual, she no longer has to worry about that, assuring you that if you die in the cyber-world you will simply reappear as if nothing happened. You get along well, despite the fact that she clearly wears the pants in the relationship. You can't help but worry about what would happen if she had this kind of power in the real world, however.

4. Amy: A youthful 17 year old girl. Appearance wise it's as if puberty just completely ignored her, as despite her age she is quite short and is incredibly flat-chested. She has short, dirty blonde hair (which she often ties into pigtails). Personality wise, her attitude more or less matches her childish appearance (a fact that she constantly denies when mentioned). She instantly falls in love with anything that she deems "cute", and often tends to be distracted easily. She looks up to you (in more ways than one), and always enjoys spending time with you. Due to this, coupled with her young appearance, most people who see you with her would probably assume that you were brother and sister. She doesn't mind this, however, and has actually started treating you like a big brother at times (possibly because she's an only child, and she always wanted a brother). You get along well, but your friends occasionally tease you for being a "cradle robber".

5. Yumi: An attractive 19 year old Asian girl. She is average height, has short dark blue hair, average sized boobs (not huge, but definitely not small), and a nice figure. She has very bubbly and playful personality, and always seems to be happy. She is also a bit of a prankster, but sometimes she goes a bit overboard with her jokes. You get along well, but you feel she might be a bit over-the-top at times with her pranks. In a virtual world where she has complete control over everything, her relatively simple pranks would probably end up escalating to overly elaborate Rube Goldberg machine level booby traps. She's also openly bisexual, having both you as her boyfriend as well as a girlfriend of her own, and so she might want to try some things out on you by turning you into a girl as well.

EDIT ▼
I decided to add an "other" option so that you can create your own girlfriend. Just be sure that you give a good description of her like I did above.
1.title: The Story Begins

choices: A lush green forest
A tropical island
A sparkling snowplain
A bustling big city
A cloudy heaven-like landscape
11.content:
"Tom! Wake up!"

You heard a loud voice and didn't really know where it came. Your only flashback was that you were setting up the virtual-reality controls on yourself, and your girlfriend Sarah did the same. Slowly opening your eyes, you look around to see that you are in an empty room with nothing but white as far as the eye could see, and your girlfriend isn't anywhere in sight.

"Sarah! Where are you?" you asked, looking for Sarah again in the endless white world.

"Don't worry Tom. I'm just finishing up with this upload."

"Which upload?"

"This world's, silly. Just let me put the finishing touches on, and I'll be right with you soon."

Finally, the room changing to....
11.title: Sarah's Virtual Reality

choices: You decide to run away
You decide to stay and see what she wants to do
You start feeling a bit strange
111.content:
The white of the room disappeared, and everything turned black for a few seconds until you heard sounds, it sounded like- birds and the gentle sounds of a nearby stream. Your vision returned, you were in a lush green forest. The air had a distinct aroma that smelled like morning dew. You looked around the area and found that the forest surrounded you everywhere you looked. You decided to walk around a bit calling out for Sarah.

"Sarah? Sarah? Where are you? What I am doing here?" You asked but the only reply you received was birdsong.

You thought about the environment you were in, it was a simulation, a sophisticated construct that enveloped all of your senses. You knew it wasn't real but it felt very real. You finally sat down and thought back to just how you got in here. Sarah's father was a scientist working on a sophisticated stimulation designed for the purpose of training a human being to immerse themselves in practically any environment. The simulation was so incredibly useful for these training missions, however the laboratory was purchased by a large multinational media corporation that wanted to mass market the simulator to the public.

So naturally being the daughter of the best research scientist at the lab she was invited to the lab to 'Create any fantasy or simulation you want' and she invited you along with her. Before you knew it you were strapped down to a chair and you were immersed in this very real looking world. Everything was so authentic, you placed your hand on the ground and scooped up a pile of dirt, which was then dispersed by a soft wind.

But the one thing you also remembered - Sarah was in control, not you. As you contemplated the implications of this you felt a slight tremor beneath you. It started to get stronger and you stood up and looked around, reminded that once Sarah had confided to you that one of her greatest fantasies was to be big; a giantess fantasy as she called it. At the time you don't really think too much about it, but these tremors that were becoming increasingly loud reminded you that in this simulation she could very well be a giantess.

You gazed in the thick of the trees as much as possible and finally you saw on the horizon ahead what appeared to be an enormous hiking shoe. Looking even further up you saw Sarah. She was humongous, you estimated that she was easily ten times the height of the tree line. On her enormous face she held a joyous look as she started to approach you, smashing the trees down as if she were stepping on twigs. In fact as she approached you felt apprehensive, what was she going to do to you when she got to you? It was at this point that you made a decision
111.title: The Great Forest

choices: Explore the jungles
Go for a swim
Something else
112.content:
The room became a beautiful tropical island, the two teens standing in the loose, soft beach sands, the sound of waves and the smell of salt before you.

"So, what do you want to do now?" Sarah asked. "Wanna go explore the jungles? Or..." She gave you a little tease, exposing her shoulder. "you wanna go skinny dipping in the ocean?"
112.title: A tropical island

choices: Normal Jungle
Jurassic Park
1121.content:
You were tempted by the skinny dipping idea, but in the end, you decided to explore the jungles.

"Mind if we take a look in the jungle?" you asked.

Sarah smiled and said "Not at all. I know you are an animal lover, so you are going to love this."

She grabbed your hand and pulled you with her into the jungle. You were wondering what kind of animals she put into this thing, but that was part of the excitement. But before you got to the jungle, you noticed that there was a fork in the path, and in the middle of it, there was a sign that said with an arrow in each direction "Normal Jungle, Site B Jungle."

"Sarah, what is the Site B thing about?" you asked.

"Well, I know you're a big fan of Jurassic Park, so I made this jungle to allow you to see the animals up close and personal." she said.

When you heard this, you began to shake with fear due to a few dinosaurs like Velociraptor, Spinosaurus and T-Rex.

"Don't worry, the carnivores will not be able to find us at all. We are invisible to them. And the Herbivores will allow you to touch them." she said calming you down.

You had a choice to make, go with the normal jungle, or go into the world of Jurassic Park?
1121.title: Explore the jungles

choices: Swamp
Field
11212.content:
In the end, you wanted to go for the Jurassic Park jungle.

"Ok Sarah, I say we head for Site B." you said with confidence.

Sarah smiled and said she knew you would go for that.

"To quote a certain movie, Welcome to Jurassic Park." she said as the two of you took the right path and in a few moments, you both found yourself at a gate with Jurassic Park on it.

The two of you entered and almost imediately, you found yourself faced with a triceratops.

"Holy hell. This is just amazing!" you said with a chuckle.

"I thought you would like it." she said as she extended her hand towards the great herbivore. She began to stroke the beak and you were just speachless.

"Go on, he's harmless." she reassured you. You took a deep breath and reached out to touch the beautiful animal. Once you made contact, you could actually feel every little detail on its skin.

"This is unreal, I have always wanted to do something like this. Sarah, I have no idea how I can ever thank you for even bringing me into a place like this." you said. Little did you know, that you would end up regreting those words later on. But for now, you just enjoyed all of this.

But then, you heard an all to familiar roar in the distance and you turned around as fast as you could.

"Holy hell. T-Rex. I do not want to be around when he gets here. You said we could ride these guys?" you asked.

Sarah nodded and gently tapped the triceratops on the beak. He then bent down so that the two of you could get on and you did that without hesitation. You knew Sarah was the one in control, so you let her tell the animal where to go. She then told the triceratops to go to the....
11212.title: Jurassic Park

choices: "Foot slave!"
"King."
112122.content:
As you continued to ride the triceratops, Sarah decided she was going to have some fun with you now. Without you knowing, she vanished and left you alone on the triceratops. You soon made your way to the center of a large field. And right then and there, the animal collapsed and died.

"That is not good. Sarah, what do we do now-" you said noticing she was gone.

"Sarah? Sarah? This is so not funny!" You said. But in that moment, you heard a purring sound you knew far more than the roar of the T-rex.

"Raptors, why did it have to be raptors? Sarah, do not leave me here!" you yelled.

"Oh relax." Sarah's voice said as if she was a part of the sky "I never left, I just want to have a little fun with you, as a queen."

"A queen? A queen of what?!" you yelled.

But from out of nowhere, you were surrounded by Velociraptors, but these were much more bizarre than the ones in the film. These were like female anthros, and without any warning, they grabbed you and began to drag you to some kind of temple. Along the way, you saw many more men, which did not help you calm down at all with the fact that they were in loin cloths. Soon, you were brought to a throne and you were forced to bow.

"The queen of the raptors! And you Tom are going to be my..."
112122.title: Field

choices: Your a mermaid
Your a merman
Your some other aquatic creature
1122.content:
You start to remove your clothes before putting them down next to you. Sarah raised her eyebrows at you, snapped her fingers and dived into the surf completely naked.

"Oh yeah, virtual reality." you said to yourself as you tried to do the same thing Sarah had.

It took you a while to figure out how to work the program, but after about ten minutes of trial and error, you got the hang of it. Then, you realized Sarah had not come up for air. Panicking, you dived into the surf after her. You struck out for the bottom, squinting through watering eyes for any sign of your girlfriend. Just as you thought you would have to come up for air, your head smashed into something. As you felt yourself slipping out of consciousness, you felt something grab you from behind, gently and bring you up to the surface. However, just before you break the surface, you lose consciousness.

When you come too, your still underwater, but you feel different...
1122.title: Go for a swim

choices: Someone comes to check on you (a mermaid)
Someone comes to check on you (a merman or another sea creature)
11221.content:
The first thing you notice when you come around was that you were floating horizontally inside of an underwater cave. Still too weak to kick out for the surface, you immediately tried to cut off your airways to stop you from breathing in water by grabbing your nose. However, you then realized that you had been breathing normally for the last minute or two while you came round.

The fact that you weren't dead suggested that you could now breathe underwater. The second thing you noticed was your hands. After you had gotten over the fact that you weren't drowning, you found that the nails on your hands were a lot longer, digging into the skin of your face, and the skin on both your hands and face were a lot smoother.

"What the heck's happened to me?" you asked yourself, not expecting to hear your voice underwater, but you heard it clearly. It was a lot higher than it had been before. You turned your head to the side, examining the cave, but were distracted by a tug on your head. You once again put your hand up to your head, but this time, your arm brushed against something on your chest.

You paused momentarily, and then continued to the weight on your head. you confirmed what you'd already guessed, your hair was a lot longer than it had been. You pulled it forwards, to find that it had become a fiery red color. You had resisted the urge to look down so far, afraid about what you might find, but now you guessed you had no choice. You looked down.

A line of three glittering, green pearls, now that you noticed, they were the only source of light in the cave, in the center of your torso, going from your collar bone to your belly button. However, that was only the third most shocking change. You saw two totally naked breasts sticking out of your chest. Somehow, I had gained two very female breasts. Were you even male at all anymore?

An investigation of your lower body revealed the most shocking change to your body. your legs had fused into a long, glittering green tail, more pearls glittering at points that would not impede your movement should you swim off. The fact that there was a female's sex organs protected behind a green cage didn't even faze you after that. You screamed.
11221.title: Your a mermaid

choices: Agree to go see Poseidia
Demand to be returned to the surface and returned to your normal body
112211.content:
As you start to panic, another mermaid comes into the cave and whistles shrilly. You feel a wave of calm overtake you, and your crying stops. You looked over at the mermaid. Like you, she was naked, her tail and pearls were purple rather than green and she had black hair. She was beautiful, someone you would have found very attractive in your previous body, but strangely felt nothing from seeing her.

"All better?" asked the other mermaid. She spoke with a strange, melodious accent, like the sea on a calm day.

"Not really," you say, still on the verge of panic, although this woman's voice was helping immensely "I'm scared, I don't know what's happening, why am I female, why am I a mermaid, why am I here?"

"I'm sorry, but I don't have answers for you," said the mermaid "I've been instructed to bring you to Lady Poseidia, our queen, she is very wise, if anyone can answer your questions, it'll be her."
112211.title: Someone comes to check on you (a mermaid)

choices: Mourn Sarah, and do your duty to honour her
Protest, you can't possibly be the child of the prophecy
1122111.content:
The mermaid lead you out of the cave and towards a large, domed city. It seemed to appear out of nowhere, and you were so shocked at it's appearance, that you didn't realize that you were swimming perfectly with your mermaid's tail, as if you had had it your whole life.

"My name is Meridia by the way," said my companion as you followed her "Handmaiden to the Lady."

Meridia swam up to the outside of the dome, and waited for you to catch up before swimming through it. The moment you emerged on the other side, both you and Meridia were fully clothed, you in an emerald dress, and her in magenta. The next thing you noticed, was that both of you now had legs and you had female sex organs.

You staggered slightly on your legs, as if you were not yet used to walking on them. Meridia supported you as she led you along a corridor. You took a deep breath, and that was when you realized there was no water in the dome. You were breathing air once again. The air felt strange, fresher, you suppose, than it should. You eventually get your 'land legs' and are walking normally with Meridia.

She led you into a large room in the center of the, the best definition you can come up with is 'palace', which appeared to be a throne room. The throne seemed to be constructed of a glowing white jewel, see through, like diamond. It was beautiful, but nothing on the woman sitting upon it. Her beauty was unmatched by any other thing you had ever seen, or would ever see again, beauty that you couldn't even describe. When the woman spoke, her voice was even more beautiful, more powerful, than Meridia or anyone else.

"Thank you, Meridia," said Poseidia "You may wait outside."

Meridia curtsied, gave you a smile of encouragement, and exited the room.

"I am deeply sorry for what you have endured," said the queen "But I feel you have the right to know why..."

Poseidia paused.

"There is a prophecy, that a dark evil force will consume the world, both underwater and overland, surface dwellers and merfolk both will be subjugated, but there is one hope, a surface dweller with a strong heart and mind being granted the powers of the merfolk, a child of both worlds, would be able to rally both groups behind her to drive back the forces of evil and save the lands from them. We believed Sarah to be the child of the prophecy, to be the one to save our world, but she is now gone, she died before we could get to her, do not blame Meridia for what happened to you, or me, the magic has been on this area for quite some time, awaiting activation. You are the child of the prophecy."

How do you react to this?
1122111.title: Agree to go see Poseidia

choices: You make the first move
She makes the first move
11221111.content:
A few tears run down your face as you hear about Sarah's death. Poseidia did her best to console you.
"This is a large burden to bear," said Poseidia "And we will help you bear it, you will not face this threat alone, I will send my best soldier, Meridia, with you, and you can gather aid from others on the surface, mourn your friend, but don't let her death be in vain."
You looked up at the sea queen, determination in your eyes.
"I will do what I can," you say "But I am, or at least, I was, an ordinary guy, I don't have any fighting skills."
"We will help you to train," said Posedia "Go and see Meridia, she will begin your training underwater, then move above water to finish that training."
"Thank you for what you've done for me," you say, before leaving the room to meet Meridia. She was waiting by the wall separating the bubble of air the underwater kingdom was in, from the open sea. Beside her were two short swords, both sheathed, both glowing a strange, blue colour.

"You ready for weapon training?" asked Meridia, to which you nodded "These blades have a few enchantments on them, the first is a free-action enchantment, it'll allow you to swing it under water or above water without impairment. The second enchantment is for training purposes, it basically puts a field around the edges of the sword, so if we hit each other, it won't have the same impact as if we were fighting for real, we'll have that removed when we're done with your training, finally, there's an identity enchantment, if any but you personally pulls your sword from it's scabbard, it will not come out, that's just for when your swimming, you don't want it flying out when your in mermaid form."

Meridia grabbed one of the swords, strapped it to her back, putting he strap between her breasts, then walked through the barrier, immediately changing back into her mermaid form. You mimicked her, and also transformed back into your mermaid form.

You drew the sword, and fond that the water around you felt like air as the sword moved through it, it's movement unimpeded. Meridia floated across from you, her sword also drawn.
11221111.title: Mourn Sarah, and do your duty to honour her

choices: The surface
Someone stops you before you leave
112211112.content:
You faced Meridia, your sword poised, imitating a defensive position that you had once seen on television, but finding that it didn't really work as well with your tail behind you and adjusting. Meridia stabbed at you. You moved your sword quickly and blocked it, before imitating her attack back at her. She blocked.
"Very good," said Meridia "You have good instincts, lets see how you handle a real duel."
She swam towards you, her blade a blur as she stabbed and slashed at you. You have no idea how, but you blocked every single one. You spotted an opening and stabbed out, causing Meridia to gasp as she felt the protective field push her back slightly.

"You have the spirit of a warrior," said Meridia "But you have to learn to move when you fight, come on, catch me if you can." And she swam away, becoming so fast, that she left a trail of bubbles. You immediately attempted to follow, but could not move as fast, you were not used to moving as a girl yet, let alone as a mermaid, but you kept your guard up.
"Hurry up, you swim like a crab," said Meridia's voice, as you saw her speed towards you. You had a split second to dodge out of the way of her sword, and a split second more to stab upwards, catching her sword on your own and causing her to switch momentum, spinning round you and flying into the sea floor. With nothing to stop you, you kept spinning round in circles. Eventually, Meridia swam up and stopped you.
"Risky manoeuver," she said "But it paid off, just be careful of doing that in a real fight."
"Are we going to train on the surface now?" you asked, panting slightly from the spinning.
"Lets go," said Meridia
112211112.title: She makes the first move

choices: You hear a scream from far off to the left (forest)
Someone else is on the beach, and has been observing you
1122111121.content:
Meridia swam so fast, she was a blur, before shooting out of the water. You followed a moment after, both of you landing on the shore, once again having legs and feet. Apparently, having a sword at your side changed the clothes you had when you changed, you were now wearing a strange coloured armour, the same colour as your tail.

You drew your sword, and found it to be light, almost like it weighed almost nothing, you guessed due to the free action enchantment. You again took a defensive pose, as Meridia also took a stance. You noticed Meridia looked less confident on land than under water. You found you could relax on land, you had been slightly disoriented from your transformation and unused to the change before, which was the reason you were weak the first time you became human. Now, you were strong. You took the initiative this time, rushing at Meridia and slashing laterally. She blocked and rolled to the side. You pivoted and brought your sword down to block as Meridia got up. The swords clanged as they collided, and sparks flew from the collision. You jumped backwards as Meridia disengaged and swept at your legs as she rose, before charging you. You waited until Meridia was inches from you, then stepped out of the way, putting your leg out and trip her.

"I yield," said Meridia, dropping her sword and staggering to her feet, panting slightly. It is only then, that you realise how tired you were, and started panting, and sat down on the sandy beach you had been training on.
1122111121.title: The surface

choices: The training buffer enchantment is still active. You daze the wolf.
Your blade slices through the wolf's head, killing it immediately.
11221111211.content:
"Someone's in trouble," you said, immediately running towards the forest as Meridia followed a little slower. They arrived at a forest clearing, as a child-sized female in a green tracksuit-like garment. On her back, were four insect-like wings, which were moving at an alarming pace, propelling her forwards a few feet off the ground. In her left hand, she held a bow, with a quiver over her right shoulder, but the quiver was empty.

With sword still drawn, you looked behind the pixie-like creature as two large wolves jumped out of the bushes. You stepped past the pixie, as Meridia arrived.
"Stay behind us," you said to the pixie, as the two wolves prowled in a circle, growling. You backed up, keeping yourself between the wolf and the pixie, knowing the wolf would soon pounce. You decided that you wouldn't give it the opportunity. You jumped forwards and sliced into the wolf.
11221111211.title: You hear a scream from far off to the left (for...

choices: "Will give you the power to change your size. But I can still override it."
"Think that growing to the size of a skyscraper sounds like fun!"
"Will literally hold the whole world in the palm of my hand!"
114.content:
The room gave way to an urban environment and you stood up. You were in an area, which as far as you knew was an ordinary street in the middle of a city. Across the street a large number of pedestrians were crossing the street and moving towards you.

"You see, Tom, this virtual reality is the most sophisticated simulator ever devised!"

You turned around to your left and saw Sarah who beamed at you. She started walking and you followed her as she continued to speak.

"All the people in this world have their personalities derived from the various mind uploads of technicians that worked on the simulation, making for very authentic human personalities."

As she spoke you bumped into various people in the crowd, as they seemed to not even notice your existence. You noticed, however, that they seemed to avoid bumping into Sarah.

"The environments, as you can see, are also very much authentic. The city we are in is..." she trailed off.

You looked around and spotted a beautiful woman wearing a striking red dress that winked at you as she passed by.

"Were you even paying attention to what I said Tom? Or were you looking at the woman in the red dress?" She asked playfully.

You quickly stammered "I was just..."

"Look again, Tom" she said and you turned around.

You then almost had a heart attack when you saw Sarah's billboard sized face staring at you!

"What the hell!?" You shouted as you took two steps backward and fell into a public fountain amidst her loud, playful laughter.

Completely soaked and humiliated you pulled yourself out of the fountain and pointed accusingly at her giant face.

"How did you get that big, Sarah?" Her reply first consisted of more laughter.

"Its a simulation, Tom. I can make myself as big as I want" she explained.

"Oh, and what's next? You can grow to the size of a skyscraper or maybe even the whole planet?" continuing your sarcastic rant you asked "And why don't I get any of these powers?"

She smiled with a Cheshire Cat grin "Well Tom, I..."
114.title: The Big City

choices: She creates a new world
She plays with the Earth
She returns to Earth
1143.content:
"...Will literally hold the whole world in the palm of my hand!" Sarah proclaimed happily.

"Does the simulation even allow you to grow that big?" You asked, believing that she was joking.

Before you realized what had happened, Sarah's face suddenly disappeared from view.

"Sarah? Sarah? Where are you? Don't disappear like that!" you pleaded.

You then heard Sarah's laughing. It was an echoing yet soft and godlike laughter which didn't seem to come from any particular direction.

"The simulation can do anything I want it to, Tom!"

Now the sky shifted, it turned black and you saw a massive blue orb that spanned the entire skyline. You realized with great horror that it was her eye, staring down at you like a scientist looking through a microscope!

Your own perspective shifted, you were no longer inside your own body, you were now in space looking at the simulated Earth. Sarah then held out her right arm and the tennis ball sized Earth hovered above her outstretched hand.

She then smiled and blew a kiss at you before you returned to your own body on the Earth. The sky was still dark and you could see the outline of one of her fingers filling the sky.

You now had no choice but to sit and wait as you tried to anticipate the next action of your girlfriend-turned-Goddess.
1143.title: She has the whole world in her hands

choices: Sarah appears around the canyon and demands worship!
A tribe of Amazons launch an attack!
11431.content:

You were standing on a cloud... well, you THINK it's a cloud. You're not an idiot, you know that clouds can't be stood upon at all in real life. But this ground, whatever you want to call it, is extremely white, soft to a touch, a little squishy but completely flat, and has a dry but pleasant fog as if from a machine rolling over it... except that there's no machine anywhere, the fog just is, coming from the ground itself and disappearing just as quickly. You don't concern yourself with it, because there is a LOT more to look at.

It's an extremely clear day, with a brilliant sun shining overhead providing just the right amount of heat. The cloud you're standing on is only about fifteen feet around, but it's connected to other clouds via a collection of identical cobblestone bridges. Some of the connected clouds are smaller, but some of them appear to be MUCH larger, holding separate houses, even buildings, all at once. In the distance, you can see bridges connecting other clouds as well, including people crossing them. Your cloud just contains a tree, a park bench, and lamp post. Not seeing much at your current location, you decide to take a look around for something more interesting.

After crossing a bridge onto a different cloud with a small neighborhood on it, you begin to notice something odd about the people living in it. You can adjust to the sandal/white tunic getup that seems to be universal for everyone, even yourself, but you are beginning to see... similarities in the people you pass. No one is exactly alike, but they come really close to it. Those two girls look the same, except for their height and face... those two guys could pass as each other, except for their hair color... and that guy...

He looks just like you, except taller.

You're about to address him when a hand grabs your shoulder from behind and a voice calls out "Like what I've done here?"

"Julia!" You cry out- it's good to see someone you know in this town which was beginning to get a little eerie. "So you finally found me!"

"Wellll, I wouldn't say 'Finally'.... but yeah," she smiles.

"This place is amazing, I really feel like I'm here!... wherever here is."

"This is known as the Cloud 7 simulation," she explains. "Because this is the seventh edition of this simulation that we've made. It DOES look pretty good, but it's still lacking in a few areas."

"Like how?" You question, although you think you know one of them already.

"You notice how some traits are shared a lot in this system? That's not just coincidence. Making completely unique individuals by the thousands would be a headache even for this machine, so we sorta cheated a little bit."

"So it's mix and matching the traits it's got to try and make these people?" You guess.

She nods. "And then it's recycling the traits to do them again. It's got control over some basics, like height and weight, but its catalog for facial and body details is pretty small at the moment, so some copies become very-" she pauses as the pair of very similar girls pass you- "...close."

"So, that guy I saw who looked like me..."

"The machine scans every new face that comes in and registers it for copying," She replies. "Your face was bound to be in here somewhere. Don't bother making conversation, because we haven't even got the speech and conversation routines in, so no one says anything yet."

You hadn't thought about that, but now that you do that actually sounds kind of cool. You keep making small-talk as you pass out of the neighborhood and into another cloud with small city commercial buildings on it.

"This is just too crazy for words," You tell Julia. "I'm just glad you didn't use this program to toy with me."

Julia smiles...

"Sir, may I brief all of you on what we know so far?" He asked.

"Yes, please explain what's going on"

"Yes sir, alright here is what intelligence knows about the situation: It appears that about an hour ago a human female that is approximately 1000 feet tall had invaded and attacked the city. We don't know where she is from or why she is attacking but in any case she had no known entry path. She just appeared at her present height in the center of Tokyo and started smashing buildings and crushing civilians with impunity. She appears to be enjoying herself and attempts by local law enforcement to stop her were utterly useless and only served to provoke more attacks. She has no weapons, just her limbs, but they are very powerful against even armed troops. We have got local emergency services to evacuate as many civilians as possible but there are still many trapped on the roads going out.The government has given us full permission to use as much force as necessary to stop her even if it ruins much of the city. We already have 3 armored battalions near the city limits but they won't go anywhere or start attacking until reinforcements arrive. However we are running reconnaissance missions and can feed live video and satellite data"

He pressed a button to your side and you saw Julia, still dressed in her customary Dominatrix outfit, stomping around and demolishing the city. She soon reached a hand down and lifted up a camera to her face. She spoke into the audio receptor.

"Come on out here and play with me Tommy Boy. If I don't see you out here soon, I'll just have to come and get you myself. I already know the location of the little mouse hole where you and your fellow toys are hiding. I think that I'll really enjoy the taste of your tiny bodies squirming on my tongue and sliding down my throat."

And with that, Julia squeezed her thumb and index finger together, effortlessly crushing the tiny camera to pieces between them. The video and audio feed went dead, and you were slightly taken aback by her threat, but you kept your cool and returned to the mission at hand.

"So what are our options, then?" You asked.

"Well General, we have two separate plans. The first of which is that we encircle the city and attack with long range artillery and air strikes. Ground forces will be used to help protect civilians and buy time if she comes over to the city limits to take us down. Overall we hope that eventually the artillery will destroy her and that she will be unable to properly retaliate" he paused for a moment and you thought about just how unlikely it was that wouldn't retaliate against a barrage from afar. You had no idea if she would use long range weapons. "Go on then" you urged.

"Well sir, our other plan involves moving in for close quarter combat. 13311212.content:
"-The hide and seek game."

Julia's eyes lit up when she heard these words.

"Alright then, Tom. I'll put you in a new city that I made and I'll come looking for you,"

You open your mouth to inquire about something but she snapped her fingers and the whole scene, including Julia, disappeared around you for a moment. Then, you saw a street taking form around you with tall skyscrapers rising all around you and then a blue sky with small clouds hovering overhead. Then people appeared and began moving about, talking, chatting, walking to and from different destinations.

"Boy, she wasn't kidding about making this a Godzilla-style rampage from her," you mutter to yourself as you begin walking down a pavement.

As you pass a shop window that is advertising television sets, you suddenly see all of them change from their various channels to a news channel where a middle-aged newsman, sitting behind a desk, looked up at the camera with a worried expression on his face. A crowd of people around you also stopped to view the news as well.

"Ladies and gentlemen, we have an emergency situation taking place. A giant human female has appeared out of the sea on the west side of the city and is rampaging through the streets. We take you live to the scene from our news helicopter,"

The scene changed from an aerial view of the city with the noise of a helicopter's blades sounding out from above. All around the helicopter, from what the camera could see, was smoke. The cameraman pointed it down to see a row of burning skyscrapers and a large shape moving about between them. Some of the people around you gasped or whispered as the female the newsman mentioned emerged from the smoke and you saw it was Julia, still wearing her Dominatrix outfit.

You watched as she raised her booted foot brought it down on a small skyscraper that was about three hundred feet tall but only came up to just below her thighs, it disappearing in a cloud of dust and smoke, killing all that were inside it. She looked up at the news helicopter and smiled.

"You best start running, Tommy boy! I'll be looking for you!" she said in a playful, yet dangerous sounding manner; finishing with a little wave and a wink before she threw a large piece of rubble at the helicopter and the film abruptly cut off as the rubble hit it.

Static filled the screen for a moment, but the reaction around you was enough to worry you as well as her warning. One woman began to cry. Another person, a man, grabbed his girlfriend by her arm and led her away. Most of the crowd with you followed their example and left, though a few stayed with you. The newsman appeared back on the screen.

"We have lost coverage from our news helicopter, but as you seen the situation is dangerous enough as it is. The army is mobilizing to attack the monster and they have estimated her to be around 1200 feet tall. A state of emergency has been declared. All citizens have been advised to evacuate by any means necessary. Good luck everyone,"

The news channel turned off to a picture of static. Everyone around you quickly set off to try and find a somewhere to hide or leave the city, but you stand there deep in thought. Well, even though this was what you had chosen to do with her, it was still quite shocking that it was happening, almost as if it were the real thing. Well, you at least knew that Julia would be enjoying herself. After all, she was the domineering type of girlfriend.

Loud booms echoed in the distance and you, along with most of the people nearby in the intersection and surrounding streets and buildings looked in the direction of the noise to see tall pillars of smoke rising up. They were several miles away, but you could still see them quite clearly and every now and then an explosion would erupt from over there.

"All citizens are advised to evacuate immediately! I repeat, all citizens have been advised to evacuate immediately from the city!" a nearby police car's radio echoed out over an intercom attached to the car as it drove past and turned the corner; the noise of the broadcast lingering in your ears.

"Looks like I best leave and try and get out of here..." you mutter to yourself as you head back up the street along with a huge crowd of people away from the smoke.

However, when you reached the end of the street where another intersection was, you stopped. Well, the whole point of her was to try and capture you whilst you tried to escape, but what if you made it more fun? What if you went over to her and provoked her into chasing you. That would make this more fun! You smile to yourself at the thought! Yes, that was a good idea!

Only question was; how to get there? You look behind you, moving to the side of the pavement so as not to be carried away with the crowd that was rushing past you, to see several police cars driving in an out of the streets, directing civilian cars to head in your direction. Well, going by foot or car was unlikely and there was nowhere you could go to find an aircraft, but what about...

You turn and look across the road to see a subway entrance.

"That's perfect," you say to yourself and you run towards it, on your way to meet with your girlfriend.

Large piles of rubble dotted the roads, huge boot-prints had been pushed into the tarmac, bursting some water pipes underground, most of the buildings around you were dotted with large holes, cars were squashed flat, lampposts knocked over.

Even one of the skyscrapers just further down the street was half destroyed, a huge pillar of smoke bellowing out from the top of it, forming a huge cloud over this part of the city, swelled only bigger by the rest of the smoke pouring out of the other buildings.

You survey the destruction around you with a shocked expression. You were surprised that your girlfriend had wreaked this much devastation on the city, and all of this whilst looking for you! Wow, she really did mean it when she told she was going to start looking for you.

Speaking of which... you scratch your head. Where is Julia?

BOOM!

The ground shakes violently and you are knocked off your feet. Dazed, you look around but the smoke and fires emanating from the buildings around you block your vision of the tops of the city. Knowing what was going on at the moment, that was likely to be Julia, but where was she?

BOOM!

Another great quaking of the ground lifted you several inches up into the air and onto your side, meaning she was getting closer. As you pick yourself up, you wonder how she could find you, but then you remind yourself that she is pretty much the goddess of this world, so she can pretty much find you anywhere you. Shame you could not see her though.

Suddenly, one of the taller skyscrapers, probably about a thousand feet tall, further down the street a few hundred meters from where you are comes crashing down with a thunderous roar, bellowing out an enormous cloud of dust and smoke. You cover your face as the dust sweeps down the street and engulfs you momentarily.

When you lower your hands, you see a huge pile of rubble scattered about on the street in front of you... along with a huge boot. Your eyes follow it up to see a huge woman looking back down at you with a sense of glee and mischief in her eyes. It was Julia.

"Well, well, well," she said in a surprised voice, placing her hands on her hips. "I didn't expect you to come looking for me, Tommy. I thought you would have fled with everyone else. That would have made the search more interesting."

You do not reply, but continue to stare at Julia. Even though she was virtually a goddess compared to you, you could not help but find her sexy. Especially with the revealing black dominatrix outfit that she was wearing, which hugged her massive form tightly to accentuate every single curve on her body. God, she looked really sexy!

She must have sensed what you were thinking because she suddenly smiled in a way that told you she had something planned and began to walk towards you, each of her footsteps rocking the street. Besides, you could not take your eyes off her gorgeous figure, especially her great chest as it heaved with every footstep.

"Not running away now are we, Tommy?" she asked in a mock sad voice, now only about a hundred feet away from you; yet her shadow stretched out over the street and engulfed you. "Now, I think I've won this game, To-OW!"

Suddenly, an explosion erupted on the back of her head and she reared back in surprise. You look up and see several jets fly overhead and then some helicopters appear and begin firing missiles and high-powered projectiles at her. Seeing your chance, you bolt for it down the street away from her as she whips around and grabs one of the helicopters, crushing it in her clenched fist like a fly.

As you run, you frantically look around for an escape vehicle. You see one left on the pavement in reasonable condition with the door open. Yes! You run towards it, mentally begging the keys to still be in the ignition. When you reach it, you look inside and see that they are.

Yes, even better! you think to yourself as you get in and shut the door and start the car, though you mentally remind yourself that you had never learned how to drive before, but still... When you were in this kind of simulation world, you could do whatever you wanted.

You reverse the car off the pavement and, facing away from Julia, who had just crushed another helicopter by knocking it out of the air into a building, honk the horn loudly. She looks in your direction and you cup your hands around your mouth and shout.

"Come and get me, Julia! See if you can catch me!" you yelled as you sped off.

Julia glared playfully and adjusted her long black elbow-length gloves.

"Alright, Tommy, I'll play it your way." She said with a playful smirk as she ran off after you down the street, literally knocking a small building out of the way to try and cut you off when your turned into a side street.

As you drove on, you looked in your rear view mirror to see her chasing after you, though, as usual with a giant monster, she was smashing through the buildings to try and catch up with you and cut you off. You frantically turn sideways into different streets when she nears you and she growls in annoyance, which to you sounds like a Godzilla-like roar.

Suddenly, you screech to a halt when, ahead of you, a large column of army tanks and vehicles with large laser-like weapons is coming towards you with soldiers either side of the vehicles. One of the soldiers runs up to your car.

"Hey you, get outta here!" he shouts as he reaches your car and pulls you out. "C'mon, man, don't you know your in danger here!"

"Target dead ahead!" a sergeant suddenly shouts out and you look down the road to see the towering monster of Julia standing at the end of the street, a naughty look on her face as she smiled down at you all.

The soldier pulled you away behind the column, you glancing back over your shoulder to see Julia hide behind a small building to get away from the barrage, which amazed you considering that she could actually get hurt in this simulation. Still, at least it stopped her from catching you.

"Go, get outta here!" the soldier shouted to you, pushing you away before firing on Julia with his gun.

You obey and run towards another waiting car and drive off as quick as you can, not seeing Julia's expression when she see's you, and she is not very happy about it.

14133.content:
As the box fell open, you saw that your girlfriend was now inside it. This was shocking enough considering that suddenly having teleported without you even noticing, but then you quickly saw that she now towered over you at three hundred feet tall.

Amy waved down at you and smiled, and you simply stared back up in amazement. The increased size allowed you to recognize a certain sexiness about her normally childish figure that you had never noticed before, and the fact that she was wearing nothing but a bikini allowed you an incredible view of that body in all its giantess glory. You then looked away and saw something behind her. It was hazy and unclear at first, but with each second it got clearer.

It was the skyline of a spreading city, growing ever bigger as you watched it. It sped rapidly towards you, and formed entire city blocks around you. Now you stood in a crowded street with many other virtual people, all of whom were staring up in amazement at your giantess girlfriend. Before you even realize what's happening, Amy reaches down and plucks you off the ground, carefully placing you into the palm of her hand.

"Hi there Tom-tom, what do you think of me now? I doubt anyone will think that I'm a kid at this size! Isn't this so cool?"

"Yeah Amy, you look amazing! I never even realized just how sexy you were before!"

"What's that supposed to mean? Don't tell me that you thought I looked like a kid too..."

"Well... No offense, but-"

Amy interrupted you by placing one of her massive fingers over your mouth.

"Okay, okay, I get it! I have the figure of an elementary school girl! You don't have to rub it in..."

You notice a somewhat depressed look on your girlfriend's face, and decide that you need to say something to cheer her up.

"Come on Amy, you know that I don't care about that... I like you because of who you are, not what you look like! You make every day exciting, and I love to spend time with you! You're my girlfriend because you're a really nice girl, and I could care less if your body skipped puberty all together!"

Amy simply giggled and rubbed your head with her index finger.

"Thanks Tom-tom, you're sweet... But do you really think that I'm not going to grow anymore?"

"Amy, I think you've grown enough already." You say with a laugh.

In the back of your mind you were thinking 'If she hasn't grown by now, she's probably not going to get that much bigger in the future', but knowing how much it would probably discourage her to hear you of all people say that, you would never actually say it out loud. Plus, even if she didn't ever grow beyond the childish proportions she currently possessed, you really didn't mind either way. As you had said before, you liked Amy for her personality, not her appearance.

Amy simply smiles at you and laughs at your joke as well.

"Oh, good one little lover boy. You really are the cutest little thing... And if you really think that I'm not going to grow, just come out and say it." Amy said, surprising you.

"Wha? How did you-"

"Virtual world where I'm a goddess, Tom-tom. I control everything in here, so reading your mind isn't that hard to do. Now I know how you really feel about me." Amy said, a few tears starting to form in the corners of her eyes.

You cringed upon seeing this. That thought was the one thing that you never wanted Amy to hear. She was already teased by others about how she would probably never grow up, and you were one of the few people who had never said such things to her. She was your girlfriend. She had trusted you to be the one person who would support her no matter what, and now she had heard you thinking the same thoughts as all the others. You were sure that she would feel incredibly betrayed by you, that she would probably hate you and never want to see you again.

"Amy, I'm so sorry. I didn't mean it like that, it's just that-" You began to apologize, but were cut off as Amy picked you up and gave you a big kiss that engulfed most of your upper body.

"What are you apologizing for, Tom-tom? You've made me so happy." Amy said, once again surprising you.

"But you read my mind as I was thinking that you would probably never grow up, and you started crying. I was one of the only people who had never thought that about you, and now you know that I'm just like all the others. Don't you hate me for thinking that?"

"Of course not, Tom-tom. I love you now more than ever. Deep down I always knew that those people were right, I'm not going to just magically start growing this late. I just wished that it wasn't true, and hearing them say it all the time was really depressing. The difference between you and the others is that you weren't thinking that to be mean, you were just being realistic."

"Then why did you start crying?"

"Because, Tom-tom, you were also thinking about how you didn't care what I looked like, and that you loved me for who I was. You have no idea how happy that made me."

"Really? But why? I've always told you that, haven't I?" You ask confused.

"Anyone can say anything, Tom-tom. Hearing you say that was nice and all, but up until now I've never known for sure if you really meant it. There was always a part of me that didn't believe you, that thought you were lying and that you were only hanging out with me because you pitied me. I wanted to believe you so much, but the idea of someone like me finding someone who seriously didn't care what I looked like, who liked me for my personality and nothing else? It was just too good to be true. I know that I always acted cheerful and energetic around you, but deep down being around you has always been when I was the most nervous... But now I know the truth. That was actually one of the reasons why I wanted you to come in here with me in the first place, so that I could confirm once and for all rather or not you really liked me that way you claimed you did. Being able to hear your innermost thoughts, I finally know that you've been telling the truth all this time. Words can't even begin to describe how much that means to me." Amy said, wiping away her tears and smiling at you as she finished.

You were amazed. All this time, your girlfriend had been feeling doubts like that about you and you never even noticed it. She had never showed any signs of it. You didn't know how to respond to this at all.

As you sat in the palm of her hand thinking about everything that your girlfriend had just told you, Amy surprised you by lifting you up and cuddling you against her massive cheek. As you the soothing warmth of he cheek and her hand surrounded your body, you stopped thinking about anything else and focused your full attention on Amy.

As you reached out and hugged your now-giant girlfriend's cheek, you heard an 'Awwwww' from the crowd below you as they watched the touching scene unfold. Noticing this, Amy simply giggled before bending down and smiling at all the virtual people.

"Okay guys, the show's over. Nothing else for you to see here." She said while playfully brushing the people away with her free hand.

The virtual citizens then left and resumed their business. Once the crowd had broken up, Amy returned her attention to you, her usual cheerful and hyperactive attitude instantly returning as if all of that emotional stuff that had just happened had been wiped from her mind.

"Alright Tom-tom, now that all that we've got all of that mushy stuff is out of the way, what do you want to do now? Remember, I'm a goddess in here, so we can do anything that we want!"

You simply laughed at her sudden personality shift. This was the Amy that you knew and loved.

"That's really awesome Amy! How about..."

1523.content:
"I know!" Yumi says as that wicked grin you're all too familiar with stretches across her face. "How about we play a game of cat and mouse?"

"You mean like, 'hide and seek?'" you ask, nervous about what that grin means for you.

"Something like that!" Yumi says as you see her ears start to increase in size, becoming pointed and covered in blue fur that matches her hair while a long, blue, furry feline tail starts to grow from her backside.

"Wow," you say, amazed by Yumi's transformation. "I guess that means you're the cat here."

"Right, and that means you're the mouse!" your girlfriend says as she points at you. Instantly, you feel your own ears start to change, becoming larger and more rounded, while a tail sprouts from just above your butt. You turn to a nearby mirror and confirm that, yes, you are indeed a mouseboy at your catgirl lover's whim!

"I guess I should have seen this coming," you say as you tug at your new mouse ears, covered in fur that matches your hair color. As you speak, you notice that your front teeth are a bit more pronounced and more rodent-like.

"Oh, I almost forgot!" Yumi say, prompting you to face her. You see that she's now bearing a toothy smile, revealing that her own choppers are pointier than they were before, with some really sharp canines.

"Forgot what?" you say as a weird feeling overtakes you. It looks to you like Yumi is starting to get bigger as you're having to tilt your neck to keep looking at her face, but you glance around quickly and see that everything in the mansion around you is getting bigger, too! You put two and two together and realize that Yumi is shrinking you down to a more mousey size!

"Yumi!?" you shout as you stop shrinking, now standing at just three inches high. "Why are you doing this?"

"Oh, come on, Tom!" Yumi says as she leaps into the air and lands just in front of you in a crouching position, shaking you where you stand. "Don't you think it'll be more interesting to play catgirl and mouse when the mouse is actually mouse-sized?"

"Uh, well," is all you manage to stammer out as your girlfriend looks down over you, with a look in her eye that you hope is just playfulness.

"Look," she says as she gently pokes your chest, "here are the rules. I'm going to give you a fifteen minute head start. Use that time to find a hiding spot, put some distance between you and me. All the clocks in this mansion will sound their alarms when those fifteen minutes are up to let you know that I'm on the prowl. If you can successfully evade me for fifteen minutes after that, you'll win the game! Of course, if I catch you, that means you lose!"

"I see," you say as you look up at the giant catgirl nervously. "Will you return me to normal afterwards?"

"Maybe," Yumi says as that grin returns to her face. "If you win."

You gulp and clutch your new mouse tail as Yumi stands back up to her full, towering height, then turns around and walks over to a nearby couch that a sunbeam shines on. She climbs on, lays down and curls up into a seemingly comfortable position.

"Your fifteen minute head-start begins," Yumi begins, interrupting herself with a loud yawn before sleepily concluding, "now."

You hear Yumi purring, apparently having gone right to sleep. You briefly wonder if she's already bored with this game, but then remember that every clock in the mansion will be going off in about fifteen minutes. Your best hope of being normal again in this virtual world is to win Yumi's game, so you start to run as fast as your little legs will carry you...
