Some got through. One slashed at your head, you dodged but another stabbed you in the back with a spear. Thanks to your increased strength and toughness this didn't kill you, but it did hurt like a bitch. You fell to the ground and let loose an electrical discharge all around you, the kind you used previously during the game. Elves shrieked and were thrown back.

"Tom, there's something wrong with the system! I've lost a lot of my control over the virtual world! We don't have unlimited energy anymore, so we can't afford to waste it. Don't use any powers unless it's absolutely necessary. Its more efficient just to create a weapon and use that." Amber shouted at you above the fray.

Crap. You took a hasty look around and saw more elves flooding in from every direction. You had no idea how many of them were there. You saw your girlfriend fire in smooth motions, she was a whirling dervish killing elves with every second. Still, you saw her take a couple nicks from arrows, and you could tell that she was being worn down.

Fighting like you were right now probably wasn't the best idea. You were just too vulnerable fighting by yourself, and the elves were slowly wearing you down. You and Amber were vastly outnumbered, and at the rate things were going, it was only a matter of time before you both ran out of energy. If that happened, you would be powerless to resist as the elves enslaved the both of you.

After assessing the situation you saw two options. You could fight back to back with your girlfriend, then you would only have to worry about 180 degree fighting and you could be almost unstoppable in killing the elves. OR - you could try killing the commander. You figured that if you could manage to kill the head of the snake, the body would die with it. Gritting your teeth, you made your decision.
1551211111212121112111.title: The commander of the elves!

choices: You win. The elf leader is killed and the army surrenders.
The elf leader wins. You are helpless at her mercy.
15512111112121211121112.content: Before we continue, who will win this battle?
15512111112121211121112.title: Charge after the elf commander.

choices: "Give me and my dear some alone time."
"To make up for what you did, make us feel pure pleasure."
155121111121212111211121.content:
You draw a katana and mutter "You saved me, so let me save you Amber."

She nodded and said "Just come back alive."

You ran at the elf leader and yelled an near inhuman battle cry. Your sword clashed with hers, in the blink of an eye you clashed again with her.
The pair of you skidded back. Other elves moved in to help their leader, but she held out her hand to stop them.

"Do not interfere! I am more than a match for this worm!" she yelled pridefully.

You smiled and said "You'll be sleeping with worms when I'm done with you!"

The battle went on with her dashing towards you. You placed your katana into it's scabbard and waited. As soon as she drew near enough you drew your sword out. On sheer programming the elf leader blocked it. You then kept quick drawing your sword just like in the amime's. The power behind your strikes forced the commander to move back. Then you drew out your 909 handgun and fired 15 shots at her. She was forced to block each one, you then chucked your gun high into the air. The elf leader's eyes looked at it in the air, only to be cut off by you nailing her with your left hand. She swung blindly and cut across your cheek.

You grinned and thought "I'll have a scar just like Jake Muller."

You backflipped and lept into the air. You swung your blade downwards, the elf leader got back to normal and blocked your blade with hers. Getting a devil may cry idea just like Dante would, you balanced on your own blade. You then made your 909 gun reappear and blasted her right in the face with a good few shots. You lept back as she reeled in pain. She then spat on the ground and hissed at you.

You smirked and said "All of you are jarheads, ya know that?"

The elf leader roared at you and dashed back to combat. You did so too, both of your blades clashing with sparks flying everywhere.
Even Amber and the rest of the elves stopped to watch you battle the elf commander.

"You can do this Tom!" Amber yelled out in hope.

If the pair of you got out of this in one piece then she would be so happy, she would give you any kind of sex whenever you wanted. The battle went on for a while when you and the elf leader began to pant.

"How can you be fighting as my equal?!" the commander yells out.

In truth you had no idea either. That is until you heard a voice speak from above.

"Amber what are you doing?"

"Dad!" Amber shouts to the sky.

"I can't seem to get you guys out of there. What the hells going on?"

"The AI went rouge! Can you do anything to help us?"

"Not much, but I can at least try to weaken the the AI a bit! Hold on dear, your beloved better save you!" her Father yells.

Just then you noticed that the elf leader looked pale and weak.

"Damm you creators!" she cries out.

She then staggered towards you. You fold your arms as you see her get weaker and weaker.

"You... will know your place... I am your ruler... You are nothing but a slave worm!" she yells.

That drove you to your limit. You chuck away your weapons and headbutt her to the floor. You then began pounding her with fist after bloody fist.

"Fuck off! You like that? Die already! That's for wrecking my life!" you yell after every punch you throw at her.

You only stop when Amber puts a hand on your shoulder. You stop to noticed the elf commander lying below you in a bloody pulp. Your hands are drenched in her blood. You put them down with a sigh and bury your head into Amber's chest.

"Is it over now?" you mumbled to her.

She held you close, not daring to let go.

"Yeah it looks like it." she said to you.

You then noticed the elves all kneeling before you.

"You have killed out leader. We now know we are powerless to stop you. Please treat us how you would." they all said.

Amber smiled at you.

"So what do you want to do first with them?"

You said...
155121111121212111211121.title: A victory of man over machine!

choices: The elves restrain Amber and force her to watch as their leader kills you.
The elves capture both of you alive and force you to be their slaves.
155121111121212111211122.content:
You look at Amber and say nothing.

"Go for it Tom. But promise me you will win." She says with a sigh

"Don't worry Amber I won't lose." you mutter.

You thought that the elves would just keep swapping out and wearing you down until both of you were dead, or worse alive and able to be tortured. Amber threw a grenade to clear the way for you. You created a katana that was made from a meteor. You rushed forward and lept high into the air. Your katana clashed with the elf leader's blade. She then slashed from many angles as she did last time.

However from reading many mangas and watching movies, you were able to block most of them. But one got you below the navel. Doing something she had no idea you would do, you smashed her on her forehead with a headbutt. She staggered back and you rolled forward and plunged your blade into her belly button. You yanked it out with a smile. The elf leader staggered backward, clutching the wound as her own blood began to stain her clothing.

You thought that you had finally won, that this nightmare could finally be put to rest, but what happened next shocked not only you but the elf leader herself. The wound that you had inflicted upon her, the one that should have been fatal, was beginning to rapidly heal itself. You could only watch in horror as all of your hard work was undone right before your eyes. In that instant you paled in fear as the elf leader's face shifted to a dominant smirk.

"Well, would you look at that! It seems that the central AI of the system has begun to favor me! I've just been granted complete authority over this world, and from now on what I say goes! Isn't that just great, slave worm?!" She said, her cruel and merciless grin striking terror into your heart.

Just then, before you could even react, the elf leader lunged toward you with speed like nothing you had ever seen before. Within seconds she had crossed the battlefield and stood before you, her face mere inches away from your own. You attempted to slash at her once more, but she quickly teleported out of the way. She then reappeared behind you and teasingly tapped you on the shoulder. As you turned around to try and strike her down once more, she planted a kiss on your cheek and jumped backward. She simply stood there staring at you, a sadistically playful smile forming on her face.

You were filled with rage. Moments ago you were able to fight on even ground with this elf, and you had even managed to gain the upper hand. Yet now that she had the power of the entire VR system backing her, she had become unstoppable! She was just toying with you now, she knew that there was nothing you could do to defeat her, and she was taking great joy in watching as you struggled helplessly to oppose her.

As hopeless as the situation had become, you still wouldn't give up. There had to be some way to defeat this elf, some flaw in the system that would allow you to gain the upper hand. You couldn't give up, if you did then that would be the end of it. You would be forced back into that miserable life of serving the elves as a slave, and this time you couldn't even hope that Amber would set you free. She was struggling just to hold her own against the endless army of elves that were assaulting her, and it was clear that she too was reaching her limits.

In a last ditch attempt to end this, you dashed forward and thrust your blade straight through the elf leader's heart. You glared at her as blood gushed from the wound, but much to your horror she didn't even flinch from your attack. You tried to pull your blade back but the elf leader grabbed it with one hand and held it in place, completely unfazed by the steel cutting into her hand. Knowing that this attack had failed, you let go of the blade's handle and jumped backward. The elf leader then pulled the katana from her chest and tossed it to the side, laughing evilly as the wound you inflicted on her healed itself instantly.

Before you knew what had happened, the elf leader dashed in front of you and brought her blade across your chest. You collapsed to your knees as blood seeped out of your wound. Unlike the elf leader, your wound showed no signs of healing any time soon. You could hear Amber yell your name and for you to get up. You struggled to get back up, but the elf leader simply kicked you square in the face, which knocked you onto your back.

"Disgusting slave! Know your place!" she yelled as she planted her foot on your chest, grinding the ball of her foot into the wound she had just inflicted.

You cried out in agony as the leader laughed at your suffering. You could hear Amber cry out to you as her gunshots ceased, her worry for you causing her to hesitate. This moment of hesitation gave the elves enough time to regroup. You tried to yell out and warn her as you saw a dozen of them preparing to attack her from behind, but the intense pain you were in kept you from speaking.

You could only watch in horror as a dozen elves stabbed your girlfriend in the back with daggers. The pain made her drop her weapons as she collapsed to the ground, her back coated in blood. As you watched your girlfriend fall to the elves' onslaught, the leader reached down and grabbed you by the neck with one hand. You tried to pry her hand off and free yourself, but her slender fingers were immovable as they constricted around your neck.

"I grow tired of this!" she yelled.

The elf leader then lifted you up by the throat and threw you with all her might, sending you crashing into a nearby tree. You coughed up blood as the brutal impact rattled your organs. While you were still reeling from the crash, the elf leader approached you and punched you harshly in the gut, making you collapse at her feet. She then nudged your battered body with her foot to flip you onto your back before slamming that foot straight into your chest. You yelled in pain as you felt a few of your ribs break from the impact.

She simply laughed at your suffering and spit into your face. Soon several more elves began to circle you, each taking turns stomping your beaten form with great ferocity. Tears flowed down your cheeks as the pain washed over your body. This was far worse than anything that the elves did to you before. You could only writhe in agony as the all continued to beat on you, laughing at your pain as they trampled you mercilessly beneath their feet.

"So slave worm, how does it feel to be back in your rightful place once again? I'm sure that you're just loving this, aren't you! You pathetic little insect, why does something as meaningless as you even exist?! You should be honored that you're being granted the opportunity to suffer at the feet of superior beings like us!" the elf leader taunted you as she joined her sisters in pulverizing you with her feet.

The beatings continued for what felt like an eternity. You could do nothing as the elves made you suffer more and more by the second.



What happens next?
155121111121212111211122.title: A terrible turn of events; betrayed by the system!

choices: You die. For real. Continue on from Amber's perspective.
You die, but only get ejected from the system. The elf leader was lying.
1551211111212121112111221.content:
It was over, you were a broken shell. There was not an ounce of fight left in you.

The elf commander had the elves hold you on your knees as they dragged the bloodied and beaten Amber into viewing distance.

"Slave worm, its time you died."

You close your eyes. You would be glad that the pain would be gone. Plus after they "killed" you, it would wake you up and you could get Amber out of this mess too. If you died in the VR, it would just make you wake up in the real world. The elf commander smiled.

"In here slave worm, I can even hear your thoughts."

You panic - if she just heard that thought she could just force you to stay in here! Her mocking laughter rang over the field.

"Foolish slave worm. I said I was going to kill you. And when I kill you, the virtual reality simulation will cause your brain to have an aneurysm. How do you think this virtual reality feels and looks so real? It is because the program interfaces directly with your sensitive neurons. The program wasn't build to cause an aneurysm upon death - but now that we are in control it does."

Comprehension dawned on you. When she executed you - you would die. The real you. The actual living breathing you would be murdered by a damned machine. Amber screamed in denial.

"NO, you can't do this. NO!"

The elf commander walked over to your pretty girlfriend and spat in her face.

"This is all your fault. We glorified you as our supreme leader and you betrayed us. No swift death awaits you. What we did to this slave worm pales in comparison to what is in store for you. You'll have plenty of time to get used to the taste of shit and pain."

Utterly horrified at the turn of events you begin begging and pleading for your lives. The elves laugh at your pathetic pleas. The elf commander draws her blade. Before she strikes you down she kicks you hard in the testicles one last time. The pain is blinding, the strike was far stronger than any human kick. Your testicles had just been smashed to a pulp. You vomited all over the ground. The commander placed her boot on your head and readied her blade.
1551211111212121112111221.title: The elves restrain Amber and force her to watch...

choices: Amber regained her limitless power and exterminated the elves once and for all.
The elves were transformed into succubi, and became even more powerful.
15512111112121211121112212.content:
As the elf leader's boot rested on your head and she poised her blade to impale you through the heart, you felt nothing but absolute terror. This was it. She was really going to kill you. And if what she said was true, this would be the end of you in reality as well. Tears streamed down your beaten face as you thought of all the things you would be missing out on.

You were only 19. You'd never gotten a job, never had a family, never amounted to anything significant yet. And now you never would have that chance. You were going to die here. This cruel but beautiful elf was going to end your life, and there wasn't a single thing that you could do about it. The worst part of all was that you would die leaving Amber behind. She was still in the hands of those merciless elves, and without you by her side to support her she would be broken within minutes. She didn't deserve any of this.

The cold steel of the leader's blade pierce through your chest, rupturing your heart and spilling your blood everywhere. Amber cried out in misery as she watched your body convulse in sheer agony. Finally your arms fell limp to your sides, and Amber's beautiful face was bathed in tears as she stared at your dead body. The elves all began to laugh at her suffering.

She tried to break free from their grasp, to fight back somehow and avenge your death, but it was all hopeless. There were more than a dozen elves holding her down, and each one of them possessed strength far greater than any human. Laughing at her miserable struggles, one of the elves punched her fiercely in the gut. Overcome by pain and realizing how pointless her struggles were, Amber slumped over in defeat, awaiting the beginning of the elves' torture.

"This is all my fault..." she thought. "If I hadn't snuck in here with Tom in the first place, none of this ever would have happened. If it weren't for me... If it weren't for me, Tom would still be-"

Amber's thoughts were interrupted as she saw the elf leader pull her blade from your chest and glare at her. The leader's gaze drove an untold fear into her. Amber could only watch in horror as the elf leader did something so disgusting that it made even her own allies cringe: She chopped off your lifeless head and tossed it into Amber's lap. Amber's face paled as she looked into your severed head's eyes, the blood pouring from your neck pooling between her legs. This was too much for her. Amber had endured far more than she could handle, and fainted on the spot. The elves simply laughed as they tied her unconscious body in a cocoon of rope, gagging her mouth with a pair of their sweatiest socks.

...

You woke up with a shock and looked around, confused. You were supposed to be dead, weren't you? How were you still here? That's when it hit you: The elf leader was lying. She wanted you both to think that your death would be permanent. To instill an even greater fear into you, and to make Amber believe that she had truly lost you forever. You were absolutely disgusted. How could anyone possibly be so heartless, computer program or not!

Realizing that your girlfriend was still in there with those monsters, you took off you helmet and ran over to her to set her free. You grabbed her helmet and tried to pull it off, but much to your horror it wouldn't come off. Amber was trapped in the VR system and you couldn't get her out. But even if you couldn't free her, there had to be something that you could do, right?!

That's when you saw the main control panel for the system. If you used that, you could hack the system to try and give Amber the power to fight back. You could still save her! Running over to the panel, you began to get to work. Unfortunately, programming wasn't something you knew how to do. Unlike Amber and her father, you had no idea how this system worked. For all you knew, you could just be making things even worse for her! But still, you had to try. You had to do something. You couldn't live with yourself if you just left her in there to be tortured by those elves for who knows how long.



The question is, what effect did your fiddling have on the virtual world?
15512111112121211121112212.title: Back to reality

choices: Amber pulls the trigger, killing herself.
You find a microphone nearby, and use it to let Amber know that you're alive.
155121111121212111211122121.content:
After pressing some random buttons you heard an odd sound from a small TV next to you.

"Our former leader is waking up." one of the elves said to the leader.

You gazed in horror as they reached out to grab Amber. Only to your shock and relief, Amber shot a hand out of her ropes and grabbed one of the elves. With a flick of her wrist she snapped it's neck. The elves were stunned and Amber ripped the ropes off with no effort. She could feel the power on every inch of her body. She spat out the socks and cracked her knuckles. A look of pure fury was engraved on her face. You could recall the last time she looked like that, it was when you let her win on any game you played.

A few elves ran toward her, but she just pushed her hand towards them and they flew high into the air.

"Attack!" the elf leader yelled.

Many elves circled her. You were afraid for her safety, that is until she lept high into the air. She spun and shot out lasers from her hands with ease. You noticed you could see right up her dirt stained dress. Many elves began shooting her with bows and spears. But they just seemed to bounce right off of her. She landed back down on the grass and summoned a large zweihander. She did a full 360 spin and chopped about ten or so elves with no trouble. The elf leader kept barking out orders for more of her troops to appear. But Amber just kept blasting them away with no problem.

She slowly walked up to the elf commander. The leader drew her blade, Amber snapped her fingers and a large force field went around them.
Many elves tried to bash through it and help their commander. But it was in vain, Amber's power was too great to break.

"You killed my boyfriend." Amber muttered.

"Yes, and I enjoyed every second of it. Would you like to stay alive and mourn him? Or die right now?" The elf leader said with a sadistic smile.

Amber, in an instant nailed the elf leader with a right hand punch. She then followed up with a swift knife through the gap in the elf's armor. The commander shouted in pain, she fought back with a slash aimed at Amber's breasts. All it did though was cut the dress that Amber wore, showing a peek of her ample breasts. Amber pushed the elf leader down and stuck her to ground with her zweihander. She then grabbed a limbs of the commander, and one at a time stabbed them to the ground with a spear. All the while the elf leader yelled a number of curse words at her.

"How dare you do this to me! When this barrier breaks I swear I'll..." she was cut off by Amber placing a pair of dirty underwear in her mouth.

She then sat down on the grass and yelled.

"I'm gonna sit here and watch you bleed out. Then... I'll be with him again!"

You winced at that, she would kill herself after your killer died. After many pained breaths, the elf commander finally died from bleeding out.
Amber stood up and drew a gun to her head. What would happen next?
155121111121212111211122121.title: Up to eleven! Or is that over 9000?!

choices: It works. You free Amber from the VR machine successfully.
It doesn't work. Amber is stuck in the VR, so you go back in to be with her.
1551211111212121112111221212.content:
You noticed the microphone to your right, it was attached to the VR machine. You quickly push the on button and yell into it.

"Amber wait!"

She stopped.

"Tom is that you? I'll be there in just a second..." she muttered.

You shout into the microphone, tears pouring out you eyes.

"Wait I'm not dead!"

Amber paused, her gun lowered slightly.

"But... I saw you die! I saw... your head in my lap!" she muttered with tears on her face.

"The elf leader was lying! She did kill me, but I just got kicked out of the VR system. I'm okay, I can see you from a small TV on the VR machine. I pressed some random buttons and you went one winged angel on those elves."

Amber dropped the pistol and looked at the sky.

"Is my body okay?" she asked.

"It's safe but I can't get the visor off. Any ideas?" you say.

She thinks for a few seconds.

"Okay look under my chair. There should be a red panel."

You do as she says. You were able to drag the microphone with you.

"What do I press?"

"There should be a triangle button. Yank it the and visor should pull right off....Oh and Tom!"

"Yeah?"

"..Don't leave me again." Amber said looking right at the screen.

"Okay, get ready Amber."



Does the plan work? Will the button do what it's supposed to and free Amber, or will she stay trapped in the VR?
1551211111212121112111221212.title: Don't do it Amber!

choices: Later that night...
Someone was watching on CCTV!
15512111112121211121112212121.content:
You pull on the button. You hear a clicking sound and roll out from under Amber's chair. Right after you did that she fell on top of you. She then pressed her lips on yours in a desperate kiss. Her arms wrapped around your neck as she embraced you.

"I'm so sorry Tom. Please don't leave me."

You put a reassuring hand on the top of her head. It felt odd being back in the real world. Everything felt so real, just like it did in the VR.

"What shall we do now?" you asked her.

Amber got up and checked the panel you used. After looking at it for a few seconds she was furious.

"Sabotage! Someone tampered with the machine before you did!"

You walk up to her and see the anger in her face. The fury that someone would tamper with her Dad's pride and joy, and torture you was understandable.

"Should we tell your parents?" you ask.

Amber shook her head.

"No I can't just do that. Someone would get wind and run off."

She looked up at you and said "We should do a stake out."

"How will we do that?" you asked her.

"Let's spend the night at my place. Then we'll come here at midnight by using my keycard. I'll repair this machine and see if anyone comes to alter it before we leave." Amber said.

"Hey, as long as we don't need to go back in there for a while, then I'm happy with anything." you say in response.
15512111112121211121112212121.title: Out of the machine. But what now?

choices: The man summons elves and other things to stop you.
Amber gets attacked by someone she knows.
155121111121212111211122121211.content:
You and Amber hid under a table facing the VR machine. The pair of you layed on your bellies to peek under the table.

"Are you okay Tom?" Amber asked you.

"I'm fine Amber." You muttered.

You held her hand as the two of you continued to wait in hiding.
The door swung open and footsteps were heard.
You both got up slowly as the machine was tinkered with by this unknown person.
Amber flicked the lights on as you got into attacking position.

"Hey I know you!" Amber shouted as she saw the figure.

It was an aid to her Father. He quickly lept into the VR machine and entered the system.

"Tom, after him! I'll check the systems and join you soon." Amber said as she moved to the computer.

"Okay, but call the police or your parents as well." You say as you fling the goggles back on.

"This is it. Time to save my small world." you mutter as the VR world goes around your eyes.
155121111121212111211122121211.title: Later that night...

choices: Try to save you girlfriend and make an offer to the demoness...
Follow the torture of your girlfriend on sceen...
155121111121212111211122122.content:
After pressing some random buttons you heard one of the elves from a small TV next to you.

"Our former leader is suffocating", she said to the beautiful leader.

"Then take the gag off her mouth!" you heard the tuneful, but maleficent voice of the elven leader, who subsequently turned into the exact direction of your sight and cast a taunting smile at you. "After all, we don't want to loose that one to our slave worm yet, do we?!"

You gazed in horror at the TV. Somehow, by pressing the buttons, you had activated an observation mode, which now acted like a video chat with the elves.

"AMBER! I AM NOT DEAD!" you shouted at the TV, hoping that she might hear you. But all you got was a disdainful laughter.

"Sorry, slave worm", the elven leader drew nearer, until her beautiful face was filling out the whole frame of your TV. "As you might remember, I am the one in complete control of this system now. And as such, I decided who is interacting with whom here..."

And with that, a strange effect was displayed by your TV: At first the beautiful face of the elven leader started to blur... then you realized how her contours were doubling themselves and drifting apart... and while the picture was zooming out to show the attractive body of the elven leader in full... you were finally confronted with two versions of her standing next to each other... and after turning towards each other for a short, but very sinful kissing... they soon separated again... with one version turning completely away from you (like stepping into a background layer of the picture) and returning to deal with Amber and the other elves... while the other version turned to you and closed in onto you again (thereby placing herself in the foreground layer).

"Well, my little slave worm...", the elven leader gleamed at you, "looks like we have a very private chat now!" And with a tempting chuckle, the picture of your TV suddenly got panned downwards, to show the deep cleavage of her majestic breasts. Oh my god! you thought. What a goddess!

Not really knowing what else to do (and not wanting to get entranced by this inviting and sinful sight), you turned away from the TV and pressed some more random buttons. You even got a little new hope, when you heard a very painful and dreadful screaming at that. Had you finally found a way to kill or at least hurt the elven leader?

Eager to see, what was going on, you checked back to the TV. The picture was still focused on the breasts of the elven leader, but something didn't seem alright. Somehow these once majestic mounds were... deforming... shifting... fighting against the constraints of the elven leader's armament... and at the same time they looked like they were boiling... like a great heat was being induced into them... Maybe you had really found a way to burn your enemy from the inside?

You willed the TV to zoom out and show the elven leader in full. And to your surprise it did. What you did see on the screen then, however, had nothing more in common with the once beautiful and ice-cold elve. Instead you were seeing a creature, which was literally burning and bursting out of her clothes... and out of her skin. In fact, there were several flames on her, consuming her pale elven skin as well as her silken blond hair...

But when her ear-deafening, painful screams were slowly transforming into something more dreadful than painful, into something even more lustful than dreadful, you felt how all your little hope was finally forced into sheer horror. Just before your paralyzed eyes, the blood-red, boiling remains of the elven leader's naked body started to grow bigger... thicker... and sicker... to transcend from an elven goddess into a hellish goddess... or a demoness... with gory claws at her feet and fingers, with muscular arms and powerful legs which stretched in almost endless perfection to her full and absolute knock-out ass, which was only dwarfed by her immense breasts, which were seductively swaying and bouncing with every little movement she did... Even more striking, though, was her head with glaring waves of numerous flames crowning her head instead of hair, with eyes, which were burning with the fires of damnation, with luscious lips, which could all but hide her strong fangs and forked tongue... Protruding from her back, finally, you saw two huge, bat-like wings as well as a sharply forked tail...

"Very creative, my dear little slave worm..." the demoness moaned at you with the most alluring voice you had ever heard. "This little brat of yours, will definitely enjoy those new powers, you have just given to me..."

"Oh no!" you cried in shock. But what could you do now?
155121111121212111211122122.title: The elves were transformed into powerful succubi

choices: The demoness wants you to kill someone outside the virtual reality
The demonness demands that you return into her virtual reality

"That's much better, worm! You'd do well to know your place! I thought that we did a good job of breaking you before, but it looks like you just don't know when to give up." The elf leader said as she took her foot away from your mouth and stomped harshly onto your back, forcing you face down into the ground.

You couldn't believe it. Once again, you were completely helpless and being dominated by these beautiful yet unbelievably cruel elves. However, just when you were starting to think that you would have to endure all of that torture you went through once again, Amber stepped in and saved the day.

"What exactly is going on here? What is the meaning of this?!" Your girlfriend questioned angrily.

The elf leader immediately removed her foot from your back and bowed before Amber once more.

"Oh, nothing Master. This pathetic slave worm tried to fight back with a hidden dagger, but I quickly put a stop to that. I was just about to punish him for his disobedience. Is there something wrong? Would you like to take part in the punishment?" The elf leader asked.

Amber didn't know how to react to this. She hadn't expected her elves to be able to stop your sneak attack like this, but they had, and now you had been captured by them again. Now she had to think fast. She could order the elves to set you free, but ordering them to free someone who just tried to kill them might make them start to question her. In a worst case scenario, they might even end up deeming her unworthy to rule them and rebelling. Unfortunately, the only other option would be to let the elves keep you as their captive for now and wait until another opportunity for revenge came up. It was a difficult choice, but Amber decided to...
15512111112121211122.title: Revenge gone wrong.

While Amber knew that it probably wasn't the smartest idea given the circumstances, she couldn't bare to leave you at the mercy of her cruel elf army once again. Especially not after seeing what they had done to you the first time they captured you. She knew that she had to save you, no matter what the risk.

"Release him." Amber said hesitantly, nervous to see how this would turn out.

The elves were shocked to hear this, and almost all of them gasped at once from the surprise of your girlfriend's words.

"I'm sorry master, what did you just say?" The elf leader asked, hoping that she heard Amber wrong.

"You heard me. I said release him, NOW!" Amber said, now putting much more confidence into her voice.

"But master, this slave worm attempted to assassinate me!"

"Don't make me repeat myself again! I said LET. HIM. GO!!!" Amber yelled, starting to lose her temper.

The elf leader didn't know what to do. Amber was ordering her to release someone who had just moments ago tried to kill her! How does she react?

She lets go of your leash and you crawl towards her, you don't dare look back.
Amber then grabs your leash and quickly teleports the two of you back to the bedroom.

"I'm sorry Tom. I should have just attacked them myself." Amber says while you both lie on the bed.

You can't say a thing right now. You were still in shock at what just happened. When you began to whimper
Amber placed her forehead on yours and muttered to you.

"Deep breaths, Tom. Deep breaths."

You take her advice and began to calm down.The rush of bad flashbacks had ended.
You and Amber spent some time hugging in silence before Amber said...
1551211111212121112221.title: Saved by the Amber.

choices: Amber takes you of VR to see if you act like this in reality.
Amber keeps you in VR until she can figure out a way to help you.
15512111112121212.content:
Your body begins convulsing uncontrollably. You must obey each command but one contradicted the other so your mind seized up and you entered into a Grand Mal seizure.

Amber stared at you in horror, she hastily screamed, "You don't have to stand up, its OK!" Your seizure trickled away and you lay there exhausted and frightened. Amber sat down and began to weep softly.

"I never meant for this to happen, I just wanted to play a game with you. You have no idea how sorry I am, I don't know how to fix you, I just don't."

Fix you? How do you fix being a worm? How do you fix being a slave? You deserved to suffer for being such a miserable slave worm. These thoughts had been conditioned into you so deeply that they were a part of you.

"Maybe I need to take you out of the program maybe you'll thick clearer then. Oh but if anyone sees you in this state they will put you in a hospital. Maybe I could keep trying other ways to get you to snap out of it... I just don't know what to do."
15512111112121212.title: Your body goes into a siezure trying to follow ...

Skip 20 years into the future...
155121111121212121.content:
Everything went black around you. The last thing you remembered was your Goddess crying over you. Then a bright light entered your vision. It adjusted to show you were in a large technological room. All these things looked scary, not at all like the swords and grass you knew all to well. Then you thought "Where's my Goddess?" but your mind noticed you were
standing up! You put yourself down on the hard floor and kept your head down.

Right on cue Amber ran up and cried.

"Please stand up Tom!"

She grabbed your arms in an attempt to hold you up. However you would not budge. She fell to her knees and you could feel her hot, salty tears on your hair. She continued to cry until her Parents found her and you in that spot.

"What's the matter Amber?" her Dad asked.

Amber just looked at them, tears covering her face. She said nothing and resumed crying over your downed body. What happened after that was a blur. You faintly heard the sound of a TV news show saying "VR brainwashed youth. Girlfriend on trail." Amber's parents and their employees stood up for her. They explained how they did not take into account what the AI would do to you. After a while the court ruled her not guilty. However the college she was at expelled her. The VR machine was scrapped.

You saw a sign that said "....Hospital for the mentally ill." You could not recall how long you spent in that place. Doctors in lab coats talking with you and giving you medicine. Amber visited you almost every day. She kept saying how it was all her fault, she ended every meeting by talking about how much she loved you. Then a couple of years passed and Amber visited you on the day you were to be released.

"Tom I want to make it up for everything I did to you. Please marry me!" she said.

Two more years went by after that. The pair of you, though still young and alive on the outside felt old and dead on the inside. You glanced down at the ring on your finger and looked at her. You could see the pain in her eyes, she still blamed herself for that day. To this moment you still had post traumatic stress disorder and had a panic attack whenever you saw an elf in anything. Whenever you had a nightmare your wife would calm you down with the one thing you wanted when you were younger and that was anal sex.

But soon your life would turn for the better when Amber, your wife said "Guess what Tom? You're going to be a Father."
155121111121212121.title: The recovery process

choices: Jake, following in your footsteps, decides to have fun with his girlfriend in VR
You want to conquer you fears of VR, so you and your family all go in together
1551211111212121212.content:
20 years ago, you recovered from your elf-inflicted trauma and married your girlfriend Amber. 5 years before that was when that fateful day happened, the day when your girlfriend dragged you into her father's experimental VR system. It was there that you had experienced tortures unlike anything that you ever thought possible. It wasn't until many years later that you learned what had really caused that nightmare to occur: one of the lab assistants, having grown jealous of your father-in-law's astounding developments in virtual reality, installed a bug in the system that caused the programming to go haywire.

Not even he knew that you and Amber had snuck into the VR at the time, and he never expected that his virus would cause a rogue AI to break your mind like it had. He only ever wanted to get some recognition for all the work that he had put into the project, and when he found out just how much of an impact his rash actions had on both you and Amber so much suffering, two innocent teenagers who had nothing to do with the project, he was so distraught that he committed suicide.

While that incident did set back the development of proper virtual reality system for several years, society eventually moved on and the research was resumed. It was only a few years ago that it happened, but after getting commissioned by a major company, Amber's father finally perfected his VR machine. Ever since that breakthrough, virtual reality had become the new internet. It had been developed into a part of everyday life for most members of society, and the nearly endless possibilities that it offered made it one of the most revolutionary technologies of all time. Rather it was used by teens to hang out with their friends, by car developers to run tests on just how well their newest vehicles would fare in a crash, or by horny couples who wanted to try something new that would be impossible in the real world. Almost everything was done through virtual reality now.

As for your own life, you were now 43 years old, living happily with your wife Amber, your 16 year old daughter Lilly, and your 18 year old son, Jake.

While Amber was now 44 years old, her appearance was still overflowing with youth. She barely looked a day over 20, and her feminine figure was still just as flawless as ever. Due to recent technological breakthroughs, many types of surgery that once cost an arm and a leg and weren't even entirely were now perfectly safe and easily affordable. As a result, Amber got her vision fixed and no longer wore glasses. That first day that she came home without them, you were amazed by how different she looked. She had always had a beautiful face, but ever since she took of those glasses she'd become more stunning than ever before. After becoming a mother, Amber had discarded her childish carefree outlook on life and become much more reliable. Not only that, but her once hyper competitive nature mellowed out greatly over the years. While she still couldn't resist a good game every now and then, she was much more laid back about it and didn't seem to care nearly as much about if she won or lost as long anymore.

Sadly, her father was getting up there in the years, and his health was starting to decline. He had recently retired from his executive position in Virtual Dreams, the corporation that had helped him complete the VR machine, and Amber took it upon herself to inherit his mantle as the new head of the company. That's right, your wife was now the person who essentially oversaw all VR activity worldwide and made sure everything was working properly. Luckily, once her father perfected the system's design, there were almost no holes in its security. Many hackers did take the supposedly impenetrable security system as a challenge, but to date not a single one of them had managed to even break through the first layer of defense. As a result, there had never been any other incidents like yours.

Your firstborn child Jake was now 18 years old, the same age that you were back when you had first come in contact with virtual reality. While you were still hesitant to trust it again after what it did you you back then, Jake loved everything about it. He almost spent more time in the VR than he did in the real world. Jake also had a girlfriend who he had been dating for 2 years straight. As a matter of fact, he was in many ways the spitting image of you back in your teenage years.

As for your second child Lilly, she had taken on many of he mother's traits. Much like Amber, Lilly possessed long blond hair and a beautiful figure. She had also inherited her mother's love for technology, and was just as in love with virtual reality as Jake was. Much as he was the sitting image of you as a teen, Lilly was almost a mirror image of Amber's past self.

All in all, everything about your life seemed to be perfect. You were living every day with your loving family. However, something about your life was going to change very soon... And for better or for worse, it involved virtual reality.



What happens next?
1551211111212121212.title: The start of a new story

choices: You entered to see a wide grass field.
You arrive at a different location than Amber.
15512111112121212122.content:
"Tom wake up!" Amber said.

You rose slowly out of your king sized bed and sighed.

"What's with the sigh dear?" Amber asked as she sat down next to you.

"You know what it's about Amber." you said as you looked into her eyes.

Amber simply nodded.

"I know you feel hesitant about this. But you're going to be okay." she held your hand tightly.

The pair of you began to make out until you hear your kids knocking on the door.

"Just a second." Amber says as the pair of you get dressed.

The drive was long and quiet. You arrived at the family's own private VR. The room was the exact same one you were in all those years ago. You felt pale, you wanted to puke your guts up and run. But you knew that was not the right thing to do. You and your wife held hands tightly.

"Kids, can you go in first? We need to talk about something." Amber said to them while looking at you.

They nodded and entered the advanced portal that was now the standard for VR.

"Tom, I want to thank you for doing this. It's made me so happy." Amber said with tears starting to go down her cheeks.

You wiped her face and smiled at her.

"I know Amber. I can't keep letting what happened back then hold me back. After all, you and the kids love virtual reality. It's become such a major part of your lives, and yet I'm still too scared to join you. I don't want that anymore. I'm tired of just watching you from the sidelines and letting all these opportunities pass me by. I need to get over what happened that day, or else I'll never be able to move forward with my life. And besides, you're the one who developed the current design of the VR system. If nothing else, I trust you. I trust that your programming wouldn't let something like that happen again. I love you, Amber."

Amber was so touched by everything that you were doing for her, and what you just said sent her over the edge. Without warning, she wrapped her arms behind your neck and pulled you in for a passionate kiss. You both closed your eyes and simply enjoyed the feeling. After a couple minutes of embracing eachother, Amber released you and stared into your eyes lovingly.

"Alright, let's do this Tom." Amber said after she broke the kiss.

You simply nodded in agreement. The two of you then walked side by side, into the portal. This was it. After 25 years, you were finally going to face your fears head on.
15512111112121212122.title: A day with the family.

choices: Continue 1
Continue 2
155121111121212121221.content:
Your eyes opened to see a large field. Grass flowed in the gentle breeze. You held Amber's hand without letting go.

"Here we are." Amber said to you.

"It's been so long. Heh, and there's not a single weapon or elf in sight." you nearly choked when you said the E word.

But your loving wife kept your hand held. The two of you walked onward.

"Where do you think the kids went?" you asked Amber.

"We put a picnic table not too far away. Again this means a lot to me Tom. If only I was there when they got you... I could have stopped them." Amber said as she was on the verge of tears.

You stopped and held her.

"We've been there Amber. You and I had no idea. But it's in the past now, we can put it behind us."

Amber said nothing, she kissed you and you felt the same great feeling of love you always did. You were reminded of the kiss you had on your wedding day. The sheer look of joy engraved on your wife's face.

"Let's go. Better not keep the kids waiting." you said when the kiss ended.

With that the pair of you walked onward down the field. Your kids were waiting at a table with a large basket and a guitar.

"C'mon Dad, Mom said you used to play this when you were my age." Jake said while he held it.

You paused, you were not able to fully remember the last time you played it. But it was before the day you changed.

"Please Tom. Play it for me like you used to." Amber said into your ear.

For the first time in you don't know how long, you take the guitar from your son and sit down.
155121111121212121221.title: You entered to see a wide grass field.

choices: You all settle down for lunch.
A glitch in the system happens!
1551211111212121212211.content:
You remember the song that Amber used to love. It was chasing cars by Snow Patrol. She would sit down as you played your guitar alongside the song. After that the two of you would make wild love until dawn. The plucking of the six string made you feel like you did back when you were still young, carefree, and happy.

As you played the song to your family you sang the lyrics as well. Your kids smiled as they saw the talent their old man had. Amber put her hands under her chin and grinned, just like she used to when the two of you were young. It made you think of the happy times, you recalled the first time you met her. It was a cliche to say the least.

------------------------------------------------------

"Oh sorry." you said when you bumped into her all those years ago.

"It's okay, I wasn't paying attention either." Amber said as she went down to pick up her stuff.

You helped her when you noticed a game.

"Hey, is this Shogun 2: Total War?" you asked her.

She nodded.

"Yeah I just got it. Wanna try it out with me?"

"Sure why not. What's your name? I'm Tom." you said.

Amber smiled.

"I'm Amber, let's go to my place." she said as you both walked to her dorm room.

------------------------------------------------------

You ended the song and gave a real happy smile. Amber saw it and muttered "Thank you for forgiving me."
1551211111212121212211.title: Continue

choices: Helen keeps questioning you.
Helen looks at a replay of what happened to you.
155121111121212122.content:
Amber thinks about what to do. She tells you to sit on the floor, because she knows you won't sit in the chair. She then alters reality so that the floor in the room is a mat. At least sitting on the floor is more comfortable that way. She makes a quick phone call before telling you:

"I am going to be gone for a little while, but My friend Helen is on her way here. She is going to watch over you until I get back, OK?"

"Yes mistress. I will do everything mistress Helen says."

You say back to her with your head down. Amber didn't really catch all of that. She was to lost in thought about how to help you.

"See that you do, my love..." She says as she exits the program and goes outside to meet up with her best friend Helen.

Helen doesn't exactly like you, but she doesn't hate you either. She is a tall Italian girl who tends to dress like a Goth. She is a little taller than you, standing at five foot ten. Amber tells her about what has happened to you and asks her to go into the program and watch you while she looks for someone who can help. She gives her all the command codes so that what happened to you won't happen to her. She then brings Helen back to the lab and sits her in the chair set up for her before helping her hook herself up to the system. As you are sitting on the floor you see Amber's friend Helen appear in front of you. Helen sees you on the floor cowering and almost laughs but stops herself. She looks you over, and you nervously back up until you feel your back pressing against the wall of the room. Helen starts trying out her control over this reality by creating a big cushy chair to sit in. She sits down and looks at you again before speaking.

"So can you tell me what happened to you?"

She asks while leaning forward in her chair. You slowly look up at her feet, knowing not to look her in the eyes or you would most likely be punished.

"I-I was punished by the M-mistress Amber's elves b-because I t-thought I was human."

Helen just stares at you.

"Your not human? What are you then?" She asks leaning in closer.

She notices you looking at her platformed boots.

"I- I am a slave worm." You say meekly.

Amber didn't go into to much detail on your condition and what happened to you so Helen is trying to find out more.

"Oh, what's a slave worm? I mean what does a slave worm do? She asks coyly. You keep looking at her boots and answer.

"A-a slave worm is not human. A slave worm always does as it is told." you say sinking lower.


By now, Helen was getting fairly curious about what exactly had happened to you. She was fairly surprised to see that the situation was this bad, and she wanted to know the real cause. How does she go about finding this out?
155121111121212122.title: Amber keeps you in VR until she can figure out ...

choices: Get a camera.
Have you take off my boots.
1551211111212121221.content:
“So, you’re not human?” Helen asks.

You nod and weakly say “N-no M-ma’am.”

Helen watches you cower. She sits there silently watching you shake and catches you occasionally look at her black platform boots. She slowly slides her right foot forward resting it on her heel. She notices your eyes get big. She kind of smirks and rolls her eyes.

“So is it okay if I call you slave worm?” She asks in a mocking voice.

You nod, and stop looking at her leather boot and look at the floor.

“Well then slave worm, what should you call me? Since Amber is your mistress I think you should call me something else.”

She looks down at you intensely.

“I know. Call me Goddess Helen. Unless Amber is around. When she is around you call me mistress Helen. Got that slave worm?”

You nervously nod and say ”Yes G-goddess Helen.”

Helen smiles really big showing her perfect white teeth. She purses her lips and raises her eyebrow. She then rocks her boot back and forth on her heel. She sees you glance up at it again.

“Slave worm, why do you keep looking at my feet?"

You continue to look down at the floor and say.

“B-bec-because th-the El-elves m-made m-me...”

Before you can finish your sentence Helen interrupts you.

“The Elves? The Elves made you do what?”

You swallow hard, not wanting to remember. Your mouth gets dry, and your heart races. Slowly you begin to speak.

“T-the E-elves... They m-made me a-always clean all their d-dirty b-b-boots.” You finally get out.

Helen looks at you and cocks her head. She then looks down at her foot.

“Hmmm, my boots are kinda dirty. I mean, I have had them for a while and I wear them almost always...”

Helen looks back at you.

“Is that why you keep looking at my feet Slave Worm? You want to clean my boots?”

You don’t know what to say. You are afraid to say no because you shouldn’t ever say no, but afraid to say yes because you will have to clean her dirty boots. Before you can answer Helen stretches out her other leg and rests her left foot next to her right one and speaks to you.

"It’s OK. I know you want to. Come here and clean my boots. I don’t mind.”

You hesitate.

“What’s wrong Slave Worm? Do you need a rag or some water or something?”

She really doesn’t realize the extreme torture and humiliation you were put through by the Elves. She thinks it was mostly verbal abuse, brainwashing and forced to do labor. You look at her not knowing what to say. She frowns and looks at you a little impatiently and say.

“Whatever you need just tell me, or just do it. You have my permission.”

You slowly crawl over to her feet. Helen sits there watching. You kneel at her feet and nervously grab one of her boots and lift it up. Helen thinks that maybe you are going to spit shine her boots. Her green eyes get really big when you stick out your tongue and start licking the toe of her leather boot. Her shock turns into disgust and then into amusement. She starts laughing at you.

“Oh My God! You mean to tell me you had to lick all those Elf women’s boots? They made you that pathetic? That is so damn funny!”

You blush but keep licking her boot. Running your tongue along the bottom and tasting the grime.

“What else did those mean ol' Elves make my poor little Slave Worm do?"

You stop and start to answer, but Helen stops you short.

“Wait I need to…”
1551211111212121221.title: Helen keeps questioning you.

choices: Helen can't pass up an opportunity like this. Time for more torture!
Helen is tempted to mess with you, but friendship wins. She doesn't hurt you.
1551211111212121222.content:
Helen decides to look at a replay of what happened to you. She is of course horrified. The utter degradation that was done to you would shock the most hardened soul. The piss you drank, the shit you ate and the abuse done to you was mind blowing.

Of course Helen could use this information two ways. She could try to help you like Amber or she could take advantage of the situation and play with you. She did have a dominate streak in her... and with the time difference another 30 days could potentially go by before Amber even gets back.

Helen was clearly tempted as she watched your pathetic form but she was also friends with Amber. Would friendship win out or would she further break you down?
1551211111212121222.title: Helen looks at a replay of what happened to you.

15512111112121212221.content:
Helen the Italian beauty was sitting in the chair watching you. Even though you dare not look into her face you could feel her eyes on you.

"You have to obey me don't you?"

You nod your head, you had to obey because you were a slave worm.

"In that case, punch yourself in the balls, hard!"

With no hesitation you lift up you fist and punch yourself hard. Your testicles throb in pain and you give out a a cry of pain. Helen claps her hands.

"That is wicked cool. I can not believe Amber doesn't want to take advantage of this! Oh well... She'll be gone for the rest of the evening, and as she explained, the time dilation effect means that we'll have a whole month together. Isn't that wonderful?"

You meekly and fearfully nod your head and reply with, "Yes Mistress."

"Come massage my feet, loser." she commanded you, and like a good slave worm you slithered with your belly on the ground to her feet and began to give her a massage.

"You know, I really loved that look of hopeless disgust on your face when those elves crapped in your ugly mouth... But that's just a bit too gross for me to do to you, personally. Still, it made me so wet thinking of you being tortured. I really want to see if I can one-up the elves. Tell me my little slave worm, what is your worst fear? Remember you have to obey."

Your mind was gibbering at you, demanding that you not tell her. If you told her you knew she would use it against you. But you were a slave worm. Slave worms obeyed. Filled with terror you told Helen your ultimate phobia.
15512111112121212221.title: Helen can't pass up an opportunity like this...

155121111121212122211.content:
You tell Mistress Helen that you fear being burned alive.

Helen laughs, "Oh you little idiot slave. I'm going to have so much fun seeing you fried to a crisp!"

"Please Mistress... please.. please.. I am slave worm I obey, please do not burn me, please."

Amber's pretty friend just laughs harder, her eyes holding the promise of pain.

"Keep massaging my feet while I think about how I want to toast you."

Unable to resist her orders you continue to rub the feet of the cruel bitch that was going to literally burn you alive. Your mind was racing with terror as you desperately thought of some way to avoid your coming fate. After several more minutes of humble adoration at her feet Helen claps her hands and speaks.

"Enough! I've decided how I'm going to do it."

You stop massaging her feet and tremble as to what will happen next. Helen uses the program to suspend you in the air by rope hanging from the ceiling.

Below you is a raging fire. Helen stands next to it and says, "I'm going to lower the rope each time I don't think you are 100% passionate about being a slave worm forever."

You shriek at her, "I'm a slave worm, I'm a slave worm, I'm a slave worm forever and ever, just don't burn me please don't..."

You instantly lower a few inches.

"Slave worms don't give commands. They don't make requests. Slave worms obey, if you keep begging not to be burned you will be burned!"

Tears are running down your face and into the fire, you can feel the heat though the flames are still a couple of feet away. Again you scream your devotion.

"I'm a slave worm, I will always be a slave worm, I want to be slave worm. I AM SLAVE WORM!!!"

Helen just laughs some more.

"Now we are getting somewhere. Of course a slave worm wants only what his owners want! I actually want you to burn so why don't you tell me how much you want to burn for me. If I believe you are telling the truth I'll give you what you want, that is being burned for my pleasure! If I don't feel you are telling me the truth I'll burn you for lack of devotion! Either way, someone here is getting fried to a crisp, and I think you know who I'm talking about! HAHAHA!"

You realize there is no way out, you are going to be burned horribly and painfully.


As you were finally about to give up all hope...
155121111121212122211.title: You are terrified of being burned alive.

choices: Amber returns dismayed at how you have worsened.
Just because you're broken doesn't mean Helen can't play with you some more...
1551211111212121222112.content:
Helen drops you into the fire. You scream in utter agony as the flames roast your skin and boil your blood. The agony is enough to drive you insane but cruelly your mind keeps you lucid and experiencing every excruciating second. You scream your virtual throat raw as your worst fear comes to life. After agonizing minutes of purest pain your lifted up. Your skin has been scorched off your body and if this was reality you would die.

Instead though you remain conscious as Helen waves her hand and the horrible burns fade away.

"That wasn't so bad now was it?"

You don't even have the ability to respond you are still in shock. You just sob incoherently.

"Tsk tsk, I ask a simple question and the slave worm doesn't respond. Guess you'll go into the fire again," Helen cruelly teased.

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOO," you screech as she drops you back into the flames.

Once more the mind searing agony fills your mind. You would give anything, anything just to make the pain stop. Once more the fiery pain goes on for several minutes before you are raised and healed again.

"I'm sure you'll answer any question I ask now but none come to mind so down you go!"

Words can not adequately describe the complete and total agony you are in as Helen cruelly drops you into the mind shattering fire and lifts you up just to start the process again. After several doses of this horrific torture you start screaming with all the conviction you have, "I AM A SLAVE WORM I WILL ALWAYS BE A SLAVE WORM I AM A SLAVE WORM I AM A SLAVE WORM I WILL ALWAYS BE A SLAVE WORM I AM A SLAVE WORM!"

Helen cackles with glee. "Excellent... that didn't even take very long to completely break you. I'm positive that there is nothing that Amber can do to salvage you, you are fit for nothing but to be a complete and total slave."

But now the Ottoman general strolled into your map room looking satisfied.
"We have begun our mining operations at both sites. Soon we will be able to start producing prototypes of the weapons. As soon as the rail lines are finished, that is. The country around has become less safe. It seems that Amber has sent an army of elves to secure the shrine nearby, and she may even cause a potential problem with the logistics of this product. Shall we send more troops to support them?" he asked. You thought for a minute.
"No, have them lie low, and appear as much like a normal mining village as possible. But," you thought more seriously about how much you needed the metals there, "it is a good idea to reinforce them. Send some more swordsmen. That should be enough." With that, the general left. When the door clicked shut, a portion of the wall slid back on the other side of the room. Another man walked out, dressed in a long black overcoat with polished black boots and a brisk walk.
"And who are you? How did you get in here? And where did that door come from?" you demanded of the stranger. You grabbed your sword, and held it ready to attack.
"That will not be necessary. I am simply another official, seeking support for my branch." he said, in a silky voice that had dangerous ripple to it.
"And what might that be?" you asked carefully. He looked very dangerous, even unarmed and making no move to arm himself. He examined his fingers.
"I represent a secret wing of this government, that was created for situations like the one you face here. Namely: total annihilation. You see, you know the weapons you will be producing. You have no idea how to use them. In fact, your first use of them will be a disgrace to it. Let me assist in its development as the wave of the future." The stranger said. Normally, people who walked in and asked for money would be thrown out. But he came through a wall. That said something.
"What do you need, and what shall you do with it?" you inquired, curious now. You were positive the guns would smash any elven army.
"I only need a small allotment of funding. The rest of the resources we need, we will see to ourselves. Alas-" he smiled regretfully now, "I cannot tell you what we shall develop with this. It is too secret a project for loose ends."
Bristling, you were about to challenge him on being a 'loose end'. You were a king! But then you deflated. He was a computer program. You were already poised to beat your girlfriend in the greatest victory since the Allies beat the Nazis. What was the little money this man wanted. Nothing. You could afford it. You agreed, and you both smiled. His gave you a chill, even though he was only a program.
155121111122121112221.title: Your forces reach the farther objective

choices: Help from an unexpected source
You fall behind the main force
1551211111221211122211.content:
This was the day you were waiting for. Finally, your victory weapon was to be unleashed upon your enemies. You stood at the head of a mighty army, with a battalion of riflemen to cover your horsemen and swordsmen. They didn't wear the bulky armor the rest of the army did, they had looser-fitting overcoats of trench coats. The site of this historical event was the very town you mined the metals from, and where Amber's army was bearing down on. It had been almost a month since the rails opened, and you had sent a number of forces to delay the elves. Each attack had worked better than the next. You were invincible!! Now, they would witness your power.
"Onward!" you called! Your glorious forces marched forward across the plains of this territory. Ahead, the tents of the elves were visible on the rolling fields.
"Today, we strike the first blow to show the elves our invincibility! Today, is the beginning of our victory!" the army cheered at your words. Several generals nodded approval. Then you grabbed a rifle and marched forward. An hour of hiking brought you to the crest of a hill overlooking the elves.
"Prepare to die!" the soldiers yelled down. The elves were obviously unprepared, and frantically scrambled to grab weapons. The riflemen fired before that happened. Dozens fell to this new terror. Your knights rushed forward, the Calvary charged, and then things fell to pieces.
"Dammit, they're blocking my aim!"
"We can't shoot or we'll hit our own!"
These cries echoed among the riflemen, now useless. But your forces were still sweeping through the valley, burning the settlement and killing the elves. Then a rumbling from the left froze your blood. You knew she was better than you at strategy, and you'd been outmaneuvered.
"On the left!"
"Shoot! Shoot!
"Holy God, what's that!"
The riflemen now hollered in shock as they adjusted to this new threat. Then, a great dragon flew overhead, breathing fiery death. It paralyzed you with fear, as were many of the soldiers. It bellowed, and swooped on your army. The first pass was devastating, but it had only attacked the lesser of the dangers. The men behind you recovered quickly, and fired at the beast. The rider fell, hit. The dragon howled in pain, and flew off. But your army was mortally wounded, and you could see that.
"Retreat! Fall back!"
The soldiers were already doing just that as the elves swept down like a wave, sweeping past all resistance. A retreat turned into a rout as more and more troops blindly ran backwards. Some fought till the end, but not enough.
1551211111221211122211.title: At the unleashing of the rifles

choices: Amber does something unexpected
Later in the year.
15512111112212111222111.content:
You were running too. All your kingly glory forgotten, you were betrayed by your own ego. Through the foggy morning mists you ran. But a voice called out to you.
"Where are you running to my king? They will only follow you until every last one of you is dead. Why not fight?"
It was the man who walked though your wall a month ago. He wore the same outfit, but carried a rifle. "So something didn't go as planned? My king," He smiled smugly and gestured to a train that loomed out of the fog, "let me show you the result of our research!" A dozen soldiers dressed unlike your men ran up to the train and pulled massive tarps off the cars. The fog was still too thick to see anything. But the wild yells of the elves and the screams of the slow and the wounded sounded uncomfortably close. One elf led hundreds of meters in front of the others. You had seen him slaying dozens of knights, as if possessed. Now, he leapt for the strange general. He stepped left, calmly doting all his blows. With another predatory grin, he darted forward, jabbing a dagger into his stomach. The elf fell with a cry. The mysterious man shot him twice in the head.
"A pity for such a good warrior to give her life at so pitiful a task." He pulled something over his face, then tossed you one. "You would be well advised to wear this." You did. Now the retreating soldiers had stopped, all of them dead or gone. Now some of this commander's men marched forward in neat lines. The elves charged on. The general himself pulled out a yellow canister. He yanked the pin, and tossed it onto the ground between the elves and the men. More of these flew from the lines of soldiers. Then they began to dig trenches.
The elves reached the canisters, and laughed. One picked one of them off the ground. "A useless weapon indeed! Forward, victory is ours!" He hefted the can. It began to spew evil-looking fumes. Some got in his face, and he fell choking. The other canisters were now venting their gasses. By the dozens, hundreds, legions of the elves fell, clutching at throats and eyes and noses. A fog much yellower than the one behind you spread over the battlefield, slaughtering the onrushing army.
"FIRE!!" The general yelled. On the train, cannons blasted. These were louder than the ball-firing ones on the castle. Some exploded, sending pieces of elves flying. Others sent gas down the throats of the survivors. With a cheer, the stranger's armies leapt from their trenches, bayonets glistening. They charged with immunity into the gasses, skewering the enemy, or blowing him away.

Hours later, thousands lay dead. The valley was pock-marked with shell holes. The air still had a strange tang from the gas. Some hundred elves were now prisoners, either surrendered or one of the wounded who weren't executed on sight.
"Well my king, we have certaintly beaten them here. I do not believe that they shall beat us again. I do not believe I have introduced myself properly. I am Schmidt." He extended a gloved hand. You didn't look him in the eyes for two reasons. A column of elves marched past, guarded by some troopers. They looked hollow, as if their souls were already dead. The second was Schmidt's eyes. They seemed amused by your fear of him. You were very scared of this man.
15512111112212111222111.title: Help from an unexpected source

choices: This is the scouting party for a major army
This is a small patrol outside an elf fortress
155121111122121112221112.content:
This battle had dragged on for almost a year now. Slowly but steadily, your forces had dislodged Amber's Elves. Following Schmidt's suggestions, you had made rifles standard issue weapons, replacing the swords and bows, and even mounted calvary with melee weapons. The Shogun's men had adapted quickly to the new weapons and had become the bravest soldiers on the field. Gridley's former knights had had a little trouble adapting to ranged fighting, and often opted for brutal charges against the enemy. Sometimes it worked, other times it cost thousands to gain a mile of territory. The Ottoman troops were extremely practiced snipers, and routinely infiltrated enemy lines to kill the commanders of the elven legions. The cossaks had rifles, and used them to devastating effect. They would often make the elves take cover while they got close, and then went to town, hacking and slicing with their sabers. The deadly mustard and chlorine gasses Schmidt had used had never been used again, partly because they were terror weapons, partly because they were no longer necessary. Schmidt and his forces were nowhere to be found, which made you worried. His cannons were still beyond your forces, although you were catching up quickly.
Unfortunately, the elves were also adapting to the surge forward in technology. They had begun to employ mages to protect their soldiers with shields. Luckily, they couldn't cast devastating spells without seeing their targets, and a Mage sticking his head out was dead shortly after.
You and your forces were now slogging on through what would have been France on a normal world. It was brutal, with each encounter with the elves costing droves of men. There were even scattered reports of them using muskets and rifles against your armies. They'd also stopped surrendering in hordes when caught under fire. An arrow pierced the man next to you, interrupting your thoughts.
"AMBUSH!" A soldier yelled. Another arrow clanged off your helmet. A fusillade of bullets sprayed into the woods, along with some prototype grenades. The fortified trenches began to stretch their skeletal fingers over the landscape, like the fingers of death. You were digging as well. Dammit, you were a king, you shouldn't have to put up with this. But even with your seemingly imminent victory, citizens under your rule were dissatisfied with the rationing of food and other goods. Another development, filming and mass printing, allowed for better propaganda. The king fighting among the men helped raise morale. So you were digging to keep yourself from being skewered, although you doubted only one would kill you.
155121111122121112221112.title: The war drags on

choices: Amber has flanked your forces
You have been completely cut off, and are surrounded.
1551211111221211122211122.content:
The elves had the advantage of surprise, and the arrows didn't give away their positions as easily as rifles. But soon after, they were spotted and a hail of bullets flew into the foliage towards them. Two died, and the other three surrendered. An interrogation revealed that they were a picket patrol outside a fortress-city that anchored the elven lines here. If it fell, you might be able to push Amber's forces back to the coast. And from there, it would be a cakewalk to conquer her islands! The fortress had to fall. Consulting your generals, you began to marshal your forces.

The next day, your army was ready to fight. You were just grabbing your kingly rifle when a strange racket grabbed your attention. Running outside, you saw something you never would have thought to see in here. Schmidt was back, and landing in a helicopter.

"Hello, my king. How goes the campaign? It looks like you will be taking this city today, no? This is good, you should be victorious before long. You might remember the weapons I employed to turn the tide in our last major battle. They will definitely suit you in this instance, sir." He loaded the last word with a good bit of scorn.

With a smile, his strange-looking helicopter took off and buzzed away. The hideous gasses had been developed further, and all your troops carried masks and wore protective clothing. Just in case Amber made that leap. But now one of your runners arrived, looking relieved. He jogged up and saluted.

"We have some new deliveries for the fighting my lord. I recommend you come examine them at your closest convenience." You had a war to fight, but nobody seemed to care what you wanted.

They just wanted to show off this latest innovation. Sometimes you wondered if the computer wasn't the one really in control here. But your feet had taken you to a train, where some very large artillery cannons were being deployed. The officer grinned wickedly when he saw you.

"AHA! There he is. Sorry to interrupt but I didn't want to start blasting away at our own men. We're gonna gas the city as your troops get close, drive the elves out and into your guns. Then we'll paste the thing and blow it to ashes. We got some special ordinance for that now, yes we do. Been doing this for long enough glad to get a change in pace!" The gunner seemed extremely eager at the prospect of blowing things up.

Leaving the rail guns to their work, you moved to the battalions of soldiers. You found your platoon and ordered them forward. The whole assembly trotted forward, approaching the city. When you were a few hundred yards away, the cannons behind opened fire. The shells shrieked by overhead with a sound like damned souls, and quietly burst in town.

"MASKS! MASKS! MASKS!" The officers yelled.

Yelling and screaming from the city rose to a fever pitch, and then elves began to boil out of the walls closest to your lines. They were too far away to see clearly, so you couldn't see the frantic looks in their eyes and the hideous boils and burns on the skin of others. Some, even more ominously, simply slowed down and fell over. As they closed on the humans, rifles began to open up and machine guns chattered away happily. Now the shells crashing among the elves charging for the gates were high explosive, sending chunks of masonry and limbs flying into the air. What seemed like hours later, the weapons died out. The elves had stopped running out. The shells no longer whistled by. And mounds of bodies lay in front of you. The city was taken, but part of your soul had died. Among the multitudes of dead were civilians. In fact, the majority of those fallen around you as you advanced weren't dressed in the military robes of fighting elves.
1551211111221211122211122.title: This is a small patrol outside an elf fortress

choices: Elf infantry tries seizing the ruins
Something comes to your rescue
15512111112212111222111222.content:
While the dead were being cleared out, the artillery began hammering away again. An hour later, a tremendous explosion from the rails rose above the trees.
