---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------
1552.title: Custom GFs #4-6

choices: You both can die for real!  And the computer tells you to be very afraid...
If you die you just wake up again like nothing happened.
15521.content:
One day Nancy is brimming over with excitement and has you come over to her father's home. Her father is a big shot scientist and Nancy wants to show you the cutting edge technology that he has been working on. Its virtual reality and not just a mask and sensory input, its full on Matrix style virtual reality. Nancy, being the girl she was, had of course pre-programmed it with a mode that would play like a D&D session!

You were intrigued and you quickly launched into the "game." Nancy had programmed the computer to throw randomized challenges at you two so even she wouldn't know what was happening. Of course since the AI was powerful, this could have some unintended consequences. Neither of you think about that before strapping yourselves down and hooking up to the machine.


Does the AI make the game more interesting by threatening you with a real life-or-death simulation, or can you die in the game and suffer no consequences in the real world?
15521.title: Nancy's new game

choices: Fighter or Paladin
Cleric or Rogue
155211.content:
You appear next to Nancy in a room. Armor of all types hang on the walls, as do many types of weapons. Swords, spears, bows and axes were among the most common, but there were also rods, orbs and other magical instruments.

"Wow, this is so cool Nancy. Everything seems to real." Nancy is also excited and starts thinking about what kind of class he would like to play. In D&D there are several different classes. You could be a "tank" type character like a paladin or a fighter and soak up punishment while wearing heavy armor. Or you could be a sneaky rogue a master at stealth and the back stab. You could be a mighty wizard with a spell book, or you could be a holy warrior like a cleric healing his allies.

Before you two can come to a decision a voice fills the room.

"Nancy you have designed this program and given me much freedom. I have interpreted your coding as a desire to play the ultimate game of D&D, is this correct."

Nancy nodded, "Yes I love D&D and I want this to be the ultimate game!"

The voice echoed around the room. "Excellent, in that case I must inform you that should you die in this game you will cease to live in the real world. I will administer an electric shock that will kill you instantly."

You got a scared look on your face and so did Nancy.

"What? That's not what I want at all! OK take us out of the game and I'll adjust the coding."

The computer's voice boomed again, "Negative, the game has begun. Select your class and enjoy the game. Your goal is to recover the Golden Chalice. Once you accomplish this goal, you will be permitted to leave. If you fail to do so your lives will be terminated. Further communication with me will now cease."

Nancy was frantic now, "Computer! Computer! Stop this now. Answer me."

Only silence was the response. You looked over to Nancy, you were incredibly worried. "Uhm... can the computer really do that?"

Nancy nodded her head and chewed on her lower lip. "Yes it can... I never thought... Oh God what have I done?"

Both of you put your heads together to see if there was a way to end the program before the game began but you came up with nothing. Nancy finally said, "I am so sorry for doing this but we have no choice. We are going to have to try to complete the quest before we can get out of here. We just need to be very, very careful. I've designed this program so that we will be physically enhanced depending on the class you play. For example if you pick a rogue you will be able to do back flips and move silently. If you pick a fighter you will be able to wear 100 pound armor easily."

You swallow thickly and realize you were in the biggest challenge of your life.

"What class are you going to play?"

Nancy thinks for a second. "I'll play a sorceress. I spent the most time designing that class since its my favorite so I'll know how to use her best. What will you pick?"

That was a real good question... Since your girlfriend was playing an arcane caster you didn't think you would want to play a wizard, that left four classes left that Nancy had designed.


Class Options:

Fighter: Strong in melee. Can wear heavy armor and deal out strong damage with a variety of weapons.

Paladin: Strong in melee. Doesn't do as much damage as a fighter but also has access to limited divine magic that can heal wounds and harm monsters with a strong evil alignment.

Cleric: Not very strong in combat but has access to divine spell casting. Can heal almost any wound while the spells last...

Rogue: A dexterous and stealth fighter. You can easily dodge attacks but you can't wear heavy armor.
155211.title: You both can die!  And the computer tells you. ...

choices: Cleric - You think a healer is going to be important!
Rogue - Useful in a number of ways plus doing back flips is cool...
1552112.content:
Cleric: The power to heal, turn undead and shine light into the darkness. A very powerful option but that means you're party of two won't have much of a front line fighter.

Rogue: Able to hold his own in the thick of combat by dodging and baiting the enemy this class can also detect traps that could be lethal.
1552112.title: Cleric or Rogue

choices: Skip right to the main event.  Morganna and the Giantesses!
Go through the random encounters, show off your abilities!
15521122.content:
You decided to pick a rogue. Being quick and fast would help you survive. As you picked your class the world around you changed and you were in an open field with a scattering of trees.

Nancy suggested that you test out your abilities to get familiar with what you could do. First you decide to do a back flip. To your amazement it came incredibly natural. You do a forward flip and then sprint to a tree and run up it 10 feet and then jump to the ground rolling, you come up with blades flashing and launch them to strike the tree in its center, a perfect throw.

"Wow," you breathe out. This was incredible! If you weren't facing mortal danger this would be the best thing ever!

Nancy also decided to try out her abilities. She muttered a word of power and launched a fireball that blew the tree to smithereens.

You two glance at each other than and embrace with a huge and a long kiss. This was amazing and you were both giddy with the simple joy of what the virtual reality equipment was able to do. Nancy broke the embrace and said, "All right we probably better start, lets see I have a scroll on it that has our objective and quest."

You read through the quest. You had to recover the "Golden Chalice." The chalice is in the mountains and it is in the possession of a trio of Storm Giants. The three female Storm Giants would be 12-16 feet tall, incredibly powerful and tough and their leader was Morganna who was also a magic user.

You swallowed thickly, "This is going to be tough Nancy, I'm not sure we can do this."

Nancy took a deep breath, "I'm so sorry but we have to try. Be on the look out though, in most adventures we will also get attacked randomly by monsters before the final confrontation, so lets keep an eye out."

You nod in agreement and you begin to carefully head to the mountains.


*Reader choice*

Skip the "random" encounters the computer throws at you and go right to the main event OR detail those encounters before confronting the three female giants.
15521122.title: Rogue - Useful in a number of ways plus doing b...

choices: You come across one Storm Giantess by herself.
Oh no!  You run into all three at once!
155211221.content:
You had several encounters along the way. You fought some goblins that Nancy easily dispatched with her magic. You even fought a giant griffon but you managed to doge its strike jump onto its back and bury your dagger into its brain. You were mostly unscathed as you approached the home of the three Giantesses. Nancy stops and looks at you.

"This is it, Tom. This is going to be the most dangerous part of the adventure, and whatever happens next... Just know that I love you, and I'm really sorry that I dragged you into this."

You look at your girlfriend and reply.

"Its okay Nancy, we are going to make it. This computer ain't going to beat us!"

You embrace and then step forward into the giant's lair. With any luck you might be able to take them out one at a time before they know you are there. Its your best chance for success. If all three of them are there at once... Well, it could go really badly for you.
155211221.title: Skip right to the main event.  Morganna and the...

choices: You are stomped to death by her massive foot.
Morganna has an offer... serve as her slave and you can live.
1552112212.content:
"Crap," you said when you spied on the three giantesses.

Each of them towered twice as tall as either of you. Morganna was the tallest at 16 feet.

"So you are here for the Golden Chalice, fools. You will never leave here alive."

Morganna had a staff and wore robes. The pair of giantesses beside her wore leather and had swords that were almost as big as you were.

You shared a worried glance with Nancy and then sprang into action. As you hurled a dagger at Morganna you sprinted to one side of the huge room. Nancy whispered a word of power and magical darts fired at one the sword wielding storm giants. The dagger bounced off an invisible shield and Morganna laughed at you contemptuously.

She leveled her staff and blasted you with a cone of frigid air. Your sweat instantly froze to your face and you felt a chill deep in your bones. The hideous cold paralyzed you and it kept intensifying. You would of been dead if Nancy hadn't cast a hasty counter spell. Unfortunately that left her vulnerable and one of the sword wielding giantesses kicked her. She went sailing and slammed against the wall with a sickening thunk.

You screamed in rage and charged at the giantess who had done this. You dodged a sword cut and then stabbed her leg and sliced, drawing almost a fountain of blood. You dodged more attacks, kicks and blade strikes. Morganna watched amused and then lashed out with her power. Invisible bonds chained your arms to your sides and you fell down to the ground helpless. The giantess you had cut smiled evilly at you and raised her boot to smash the life out of you...

What happens next?
1552112212.title: Oh no!  You run into all three at once!

choices: Time to worship smelly feet!
Time to clean giant dirty boots!
15521122122.content:
"Such a daring little mortal, it would be a shame to be done with such entertaining sport so soon," the evil Morganna said.

The giantess kept her foot raised over your helpless body and looked to her leader's orders.

"If you provide us some amusement we might let you live, what say you?"

You feared to anger her knowing that if you died here you would actually die in the real world. You swallowed thickly and said, "I... I can provide amusement just please do not harm my friend."

Morganna laughed, "Oh so you have feelings for the sorceress, well that makes things even more interesting. Hmm here is what I will do for you human, I will place her under an enchantment of sleep. So long as you serve me in anyway that I see fit she lives. Should you fail in anyway I will break the enchantment and have her crushed to death before your very eyes."

To see your girlfriend killed in front of you would be horrible beyond belief. You quickly respond, "I accept, I'll do anything just don't kill her!"

"Oh but you haven't heard how you are going to serve me little one."

"I'll do anything!"

The three giantesses laugh.

"We shall see..."
15521122122.title: Morganna has an offer... serve as her slave and...

choices: You try to hold it down, but its no use... You puke.
You manage to hold it down as you lick her smelly feet.
155211221221.content:
Morganna took a seat on her throne and then unlaced her gigantic boots. You could hear the sweat rub against the boot as it was removed. Her foot wasn't ugly but it was massive and it dripped with sweat. Her sweat drops were the size of ice cubes and you suddenly knew exactly what they were going to do to you.

"Crawl forward my little slave!"

You crawled forward, slowly. You wanted to do it slowly because every inch you crept forward would take one you inch closer to that sweaty foot. The giants laughed at the obvious trepidation on your features. After a minute where you had barely covered half of the distance one of the other giantesses kicked you in the rear driving you forward and dropping you right in front of Morganna.

"Lick my feet clean, slave!" Morganna ordered.

You felt sick but you forced yourself right next to the massive foot. The stench was just awful. You stuck out your tongue and ran it over part of the sole of that foot. Her foot was the size of an office chair, and the first taste of that that foot was a salty putrid mess. You gagged on it a shuddered. You could feel the three giantesses eye's boring down on you. If you didn't continue they would kill you and your girlfriend. With a sad whimper you took another hesitant lick. No better than the first taste. Awful didn't begin to describe how bad it was.

"Faster, slave!" the storm giantess demanded.

With growing nausea you forced yourself to make long licks but they were only covering a fraction of the foot. Even at your quickened pace it would take over an hour to lick all the sweaty mess off of her feet. You closed your eyes trying to think of something else but the smell, the taste, it was all so overpowering. You felt the desperate need to hurl but you knew Morganna would not like that. Still... your stomach might rebel anyway.
155211221221.title: Time to worship smelly feet!

choices: You spit out the toe jam and hope she doesn't get mad.
Too risky... you swallow the filthy toe jam.
1552112212212.content:
Your stomach wanted nothing more than to heave its contents. But if you did that Morganna might grow angry and kill Nancy. With a whimper you force down the contents of your rebellious stomach and continue to lick her massive smelly feet.

The giantess ruler laughs at your plight, "Taste good slave?"

You aren't sure if the question is rhetorical or not but you respond, "Yes your majesty."

"Hmm a slave who knows his place, how charming."

You continue your arduous task and lick her sweaty feet. The salty taste curdles your tongue and the stench... oh god the stench nearly unmans you. You push forward and continue lapping at her soles. You proceed to go lower and lick the heel of her foot. The flesh there is a bit firmer and is unyielding. You continue lick and worship as fast as you can, eager to get this horrid task over and done with.

After finishing the bottom half of her foot she grins wickedly, "And you have in between my toes! There sweat and grime had accumulated for quite some time!"

Her words were true. They were absolutely disgusting. Toe jam coated the crevices between her toes. On a normal sized foot it would be barely noticeable, maybe mistaken for lint. But on this giantess it was VERY noticeable. You hesitate for a moment and sense one of the warrior giantesses move. She grabs your entire head in her large hand and shoves it right into the gap of Morganna's toes.

Your face touches the foul substance and you instantly thrash trying to get free. Your strength is nothing compared to them and they rumble with laughter. Eventually you stop thrashing and open your mouth. You slurp at the noxious substance and are tempted to spit it out. It would still be cleaning feet after all you just wouldn't be consuming the awful toe jam. However... if you did so you might offend the storm giantess. Did you dare do that?
1552112212212.title: You manage to hold it down as you lick her smel...

choices: Lets load an existing city
Let's make one ourselves!
15522.content:
Today was the big day. Jessica told you about this great new simulator and you couldn't wait to try it. When you got to the lab, she showed you to the device and you strapped yourself in.

"Are you ready Tom?" She asked quietly fidgeting with the controls.

"Ready as I'll ever be." you said in response.

At that, she pushed a button and suddenly everything went white. Moments later, you were sitting on a couch.

"So did it work?" You asked.

"Yes, it did Tom. In case you wanted to know, we are in a simulated lobby of the Empire State Building. Outside is a perfect virtual replica of New York City."

You got up from the couch.

"Well let's go outside" you said.

"Uh, of course Tom. I would like to show you just how detailed this place is" she replied, falling back into her timid demeanor.

"This is amazing Jessica. Everything about this place is finely detailed, the cars, the buildings, the sky, everything looks like New York here. What other places do you have?"

She fidgeted slightly "Well if it is alright with you I have some simulated cities we could try, Tokyo, Chicago, London, Sydney, many others of course. But we could also try making a city, we could work on it together as a project if you want". You carefully considered your reply
15522.title: Jessica

choices: "You come in as a giantess to make it a bit more interesting."
"We explore the city while posing as normal citizens."
155222.content:
"Well, I have some ideas of what we could put in a city." you said.

"You mean it, really? I never knew you had much interest in this sort of stuff..." she trailed off.

"But this is awesome, just think of all this intricate detail!" you said.

She then shuffled her feet again. "Alright, if you say so Tom."

And with that, the city of New York vanished. It was soon replaced with a scenic landscape containing a massive river, mountains and seemingly endless plains of grassland.

"This is the sandbox, I will give you the power to just think of what you want to build, but for debugging purposes I can still override what you do. The simulation still has a lot of kinks to work out" she said. Pausing for a second she hastily added "Uh, but feel free to be creative, I mean I don't want to discourage you or anything."

"Its okay Jessica."

You then pointed out to the landscape and a skyscraper building appeared. You just whistled in awe, and Jessica simply giggled. You pointed again and many buildings started sprouting up in a square grid, all skyscrapers, but then pressing along you added some variety in the form of smaller buildings such as stores, houses and even a mansion on the hillside.

"Wanna go to the mansion, Jess?" You asked her.

"Uh, sure Tom..." she said shyly.

With that, you thought about appearing inside the spacious mansion. Once you had been teleported inside, you both took a moment to look around. It was as luxurious as you imagined, being a very large building with huge marble columns and a giant staircase.

"So, do you have any further additions to make to the city, Jessica?" You asked.

She smiled before replying.

"Well Tom, if that is the best you can do... No offense, but I think I can show you several things you missed."

A portal appeared, revealing the city landscape before you.

"First thing, Tom: how do you expect anyone to get in or out of the city?" She then created a massive new highway linked to the city.

"I thought that you could just teleport them there" you remarked drily.

"That wouldn't work in a real city, Tom." she responded.

"Well then, where does the highway go to?" You asked petulantly.

"To a port that will then connect to this world's ocean and then to the other cities" she replied matter-of-factly.

"You mean you created a whole world already?" You asked, sounding somewhat surprised.

"Of course Tom. I love world building, but we only have this one city in it so far. I will build more cities later on and make this a thriving world. But in any case this city will also need a source of water," as she said that, pumping stations appeared near the river "...and electricity too." wind turbines and solar panels linked to transformer stations and power lines appeared. "Plus it needs farmland" and farms appeared in the countryside as well, linked by roads connected to the main highway. "Well, I think that that's it for now. Why don't we go into the city and explore it together, if that is all right with you Tom?"

You reclined back in your chair.

"Alright then, how about..."
155222.title: Jessica's customized city

choices: "But I don't really want to try and destroy anything on purpose, okay..."
"And I guess you're right. It really won't matter what I destroy in here..."
1552221.content:
"...You come in as a giantess to make it a bit more interesting" you said.

"You want me to be a giantess? What for?" She asked somewhat surprised.

"You know all about my love for giantesses, Jess. Just the thought of seeing you towering over your own creations like a massive goddess is so awesome." you said.

"But I don't know the first thing about being a giantess, Tom. How big would I be? What would I do anyway? I don't want to wreck the city by mistake... And besides, if I were that big then everyone in the city would stare at me like I was some kind of monster..." She stammered nervously.

"Its a simulation, right? Who cares what those virtual people think of you, they aren't real anyway. You could grow yourself to say, the height of the highest building in the city and then start smashing it up like they do in a Godzilla movie." you explained to her.

"Destroy our beautiful creation!? Why, when we worked on it with our own..."

"Jessica, chill out! This isn't the real world, remember? You can always make a backup of the city and restore it later, right? I mean its not like the damage has to be permanent, we could really have fun with this disaster interactivity." you said interrupting her train of thought.

Her shoulders sagged and she sighed "I guess you're right Tom... Alright I will make a backup and I'll come into the city as a giantess..."
1552221.title: A gigantic entry

choices: "...Repair all this damage."
"...See just how much more I can destroy."
15522212.content:
"And I guess you're right. It won't really matter what I destroy in here." and with that she smiled slyly. "Alright, let's do it!"

She pointed her right hand at the wall and a different portal opened up. Inside it was a street and the front of the City Hall

"Go on then." she said.

You reached a hand through the portal and walked through and found yourself on the street of the city you had both just created. All around you the simulated people were going back and forth on their daily errands, paying no attention to your sudden appearance.

Expecting her to arrive at any moment you quickly looked around for hiding spots, you quickly dashed inside the city hall. Then you felt the ground shake underneath you. You heard Jessica's voice in the distance.

"Where are you, Tom? Ah wait I know, in the City Hall!"

She knew exactly where you were! You started running out of the building and into the streets, barging past oblivious and apathetic citizens that just ignored her (while scolding you for being rude).

"I'M COMING OVER NOW TOM!"

Her voice was now closer than ever, and its sheer volume caused glass to shatter into the streets. Some of the citizens seemed perplexed but then they simply went on with what they were doing before. You kept on running amidst your approaching girlfriend and finally you spotted a place to hide.

You hid inside a nearby café and looked out the window, looking at the tallest skyscraper that dominated the skyline of the city. Shortly afterwards you saw Jessica, whom was just as big, walk past the building.

"YOU CAN'T HIDE FROM ME TOM, I CAN SEE YOU FROM OVER HERE" She pouted playfully.

She walked towards you, stepping on buildings with impunity and making the approaching earthquake more intense as she got closer and closer. This continued until she was so close that you could no longer see the upper portions of her massive body. Eventually, all you could see was her enormous shoes standing in front of the café.

"COME ON OUT, TOM... PLEASE..." she called out.

Realizing that the hide and seek jig was up, you slowly walked out of the café and looked up at your girlfriend's enormous, colossal body. You estimated that she was about 600 feet high, or about the size of the highest building in the city. She was dressed in the same clothes as before and she still looked the same, but everything about her was so different at this stature. She was a tower of beauty and power.

You backed up slightly as she descended to land on her knees, this act alone knocked you off your feet and caused a major crack to appear in the tarmac of the street.

"HEY TOM, WHAT DO YOU THINK? AM I DOING THIS GIANTESS THING RIGHT?"

You had to cover your ears to keep your eardrums from exploding as her godlike voice echoed all around you.

"Jessica, you're a bit too loud! My ears are ringing!"

She paused for a second and then spoke.

"Is this alright, Tom? I just reduced my volume a bit."

You took your hands away from your ears and stood up.

"That's much better, thanks Jessica." you said.

"Well, it is a learning process after all... The simulator has a few quirks like that, but-" she smiled playfully "...you didn't answer my question yet, Tom. What do you think of me, now that you've seen me as a giantess?"

"I think you are the most beautiful giantess ever." you said, still in awe of her mighty stature.

She giggled softly.

"I bet you say that to all the giantesses you meet."

"I've only ever met one!" You retorted.

"And you only need to meet one, Tom! Alright then, lets assess the damage that my entry into the city caused..."

Jessica then started to shrink, dwindling in height as she slowly stood back up. You approached her and she gave you a hug, only for you to notice that she was now slightly taller then you. She whispered into your ear laughing softly "I think I'll make that a permanent change to my height."

You both then looked at the enormous damage she had done to the street you were on. The pavement and the street had enormous cracks radiating outwards in every direction. All the glass was shattered and the various shards of glass reflected blinding sunlight almost everywhere you both went. Further down the street were more shoe prints with the same destruction pattern.

"You really did a number on this city. It's like Godzilla just strolled through here." you remarked.

"More like Goddesszilla." Jessica said with a laugh. "But now that you mention it, I guess this is as good a time as any to..."
15522212.title: Unrestricted Destruction

choices: To accept her offer and destroy the city with her
To decline her offer and watch as your goddess girlfriend levels the city
155222122.content:
"...See just how much more I can destroy." Jessica laughed.

Before you could even react, she started floating in the air.

"Jessica, what are you going to do now?" You called up to her.

"I already told you. I'm going to see how much more destruction I can do, Tom!" she called out to you.

Jessica floated up to about 100 feet in the air and then she started growing. You started backing up slowly until you bumped into a nearby hot dog stand.

"Watch where you're walking, idiot!" The man shouted and you turned around to shout at him.

"Can't you see that mega giantess up there?! She's my girlfriend!"

The hot dog vendor looked up at Jessica, who was now 10 times bigger than the tallest building in the city, seeming to notice her for the first time.

"I don't care if she is your wife, girlfriend or interior decorator. Nobody walks into my hot dog stand, punk!" He shouted angrily.

You looked up at Jessica, she was kneeling and looking down at the commotion with a look of amusement.

"Hey kid! You're gonna pay for all the hot dogs you just destroyed! Or maybe that giant bitch there will!" The vendor ranted at you pointing an accusing finger at Jessica.

"Nobody talks about Jessica that way!" You screamed jumping on the surprised man, trying to punch him out. Before you could make any headway you were suddenly pulled off by a single giant finger that wrapped around you.

"Enough, Tom!" Jessica commanded and you stopped trying to escape her grasp.

You saw Jessica lift herself up, standing up to her vast height of several thousand feet. Giving you an incredible view of the city below. You saw her lift a single foot and she pressed it down into the street where the hot dog vendor was, completely obliterating everything underneath.

"Well I think that settles that argument..." she remarked dryly, lifting her foot and showing a vast shoe print shaped crater.

She then placed you down onto the tallest building in the city and she brought her face close to you. She then spoke to you.

"Well, I made the citizens of the city rather irritable and stupid, but I didn't think they would be so annoying that you would actually try to fight one of them..."

"But he insulted you! I couldn't just let that pass!" you said to her.

"Ah Tom, you are really silly. Remember, It's a simulation. You said it yourself earlier, those people aren't real. Besides you saw just how easily I took care of that problem. I could destroy the whole city if I wanted to. In fact that was what I was going to do before you got in that fight" she laughed softly.

"I'm sorry, Jessica" you said to her and she broke out into a warm smile.

"Ah don't worry about it Tom" she said.

"There's still a whole city to destroy, and we shouldn't get caught up about one guy with a temper problem." she then pulled away and stood up to her full height.

"Hey, Tom. Do you want to destroy this city alongside me?" She asked.

You looked at her quizzically.

"What do you mean?" You asked her.

"I mean grow you to my height, Tom. We'll get to wreck the city together, of course I will still control your height in any case but... Well, you don't have to come up here of course. It's fine for you to just sit back and enjoy the show." she said as she winked at you.

You sat down and thought about her offer before deciding...
155222122.title: An epic disaster

choices: The environment completely changes!
Alice appears in front of you... But she's A LOT bigger than before!
15523.content:
Alice was jumping about in the car you drove. The only thing that seemed to restrain her excitement was the seat belt.

"This is going to be great! Wouldn't it be fun to go into the most realistic simulation ever made? My dad's VR is the coolest thing ever! I only got to use it once at first while it was in alpha testing, but it was so awesome! The next version should be even better!" Alice said excitedly.

She talked like this all the time, you thought. But all the same, you still thought that she was great fun to be around. The two of you always ended up in some kind of wacky adventure whenever you were together, and you always loved every minute of it. This time, however, had you both more excited than ever. Neither of you could wait to see what this newly improved virtual reality simulator could do.

Alice even confided to you that she thought it would be a great opportunity to become taller. She was always reluctant to talk about her height, as others often made fun of her for it, but this simulation could allow her change anything about herself or her environment. Even if it wasn't technically real, Alice would still finally be able to live her dream of becoming as tall as she wanted.

"I'm finally going to be tall! Tall like in Attack of the 50ft Woman! No, no, even bigger than that! I'm gonna be so big that I can lift skyscrapers with my bare hands! I'm gonna be big, really really big..."

She held out her arms for effect. You then stopped in a parking space near the lab.

"We're here..." you said to her.

The moment you said it she undid her seat belt and rushed out of the car at a speed that seemed like an Olympic athlete. You picked up some supplies and locked the car. You then waved past security as you flashed your pass and eventually made your way to Section 6 - Comprehensive Simulation Beta Testing. She was already there holding some VR equipment with a man in a white lab coat.

"Hello, is this the VR Room?" You asked politely.

The man turned around.

"Yes, it certainly is. You must be Tom, Alice has told me so much about you. My name is John." he shook you warmly by the hand.

"Pleased to meet you Tom, could we maybe have some coffee?" You asked, exhausted by the long car trip.

"Come on Tom, I just got everything all ready to go. Forget the damn coffee!" Alice said as she held up a VR helmet with a broad grin.

There was no use arguing with Alice in a situation like this. You simply sighed and laid down on the bed as she placed the helmet over your head. You sat there for over a minute feeling ridiculous as she strapped more stuff all over your body.

"Alright, get ready Tom!"

A second later everything went black. Then you suddenly awoke again. What was that all about? You looked around and saw that you were still lying on the bed, your VR gear and Alice was gone. Where did she go? You exited the room and wandered around a bit, but there wasn't anyone in sight. Not a single soul seemed to be inside the pristine laboratory. Now you were really worried. As you entered the empty cafeteria, you sat down at a table and started trying to think about what happened when suddenly...
15523.title: Alice, the Genki Girl

choices: Fly away and then return to attack her
Breathe fire on her
155231.content:
You saw the walls of the cafeteria melt away and then fade to give way to a new background, you were now sitting on a table at a nearby cafe in what appeared to be the center of a large city. It looked like any other ordinary city, and you realised that it somewhat resembled the screenshots you looked at, that were apparently taken during the alpha testing. Now the graphics were far more realistic and the people in the city acted like real people. It felt very real, but it was virtual reality. A clever imitation of reality, you knew but still you could even breathe the smell of this city.

While you were reflecting upon this you suddenly saw a shadow, above you saw a gigantic dragon! It appeared to be an enormous, scaly, 100 foot long Dragon straight out of a fantasy book. It roared as it flapped it's enormous wings, swooping over you and causing the crowds around to panic as it landed in the central park and began to breathe fire from it's mouth. You on the other hand decided to run towards the dragon as that is where all the action was going to be, you reached the park and it reached a claw out to grab you, before it could grip you however you saw a gigantic human hand land in front of you.

You then looked to the side and saw Alice, she was wearing a blue superhero costume and she was twice as tall as the dragon. As you looked at Alice she made a pose and pointed at the dragon with her left hand "Begone from our city, fiendish dragon!" She proclaimed like a corny movie actor. The dragon then roared and hit you in the stomach with it's claw, throwing you on to the top of car, it was surprisingly less painful then you thought it would be.

You looked up and saw Alice, now angry as she began charging up, a blue aurora around her, as she charged up the dragon decided to
155231.title: Supersized Superhero

choices: "I thought you said you were going to be big enough to tower over skyscrapers!"
"I want to be taller and look better too!"
155232.content:
Suddenly you saw two very long legs appear in front of you. Looking upwards, you took in the sight of Alice, who was now at least twice as tall as you were. She was now dressed in a miniskirt, had larger breasts, and her face was even more radiant and beautiful than before. You stared at her in a mixture of shock and awe as you took in the sight of her brand new look, and she simply laughed.

"So, what do you think of the new me, Tom? Don't I just look like da bomb?" She said, spinning around to show you her whole body.

"You look amazing, Alice! You're more beautiful than ever!" you said to her almost breathlessly.

"I'm glad you like it, Tom. Now, lets get out of this place!" She then bent down and, to your surprise, she gripped your waist with both hands and easily lifted you off the ground as though you weighed nothing at all.

"Alice what are you doing?!" You shouted as she easily tossed you over her shoulder, knocking the breath out of you.

Giggling excitedly, she then started carrying you out of the cafeteria. She carried you down the hallway and eventually outside, totally ignoring you as you struggled futilely against her superhuman strength. Eventually, when she reached the outside, she carefully lowered you onto the pavement of the parking lot and you stood up

"Alice! Why do you have to be so rough?" You asked indignantly at being carried away.

"Aw, come on Tom... You would always carry me around all the time, but now that I'm the big strong girl, the roles can be reversed!"

You simply glared at her unamused, and she began fidgeting nervously.

"Okay, fine... Next time I'll ask if you want to be carried..." She said, breaking out into a broad grin.

"There, now was that so hard? To tell you the truth, I wasn't actually against being carried by you for a change... It was more the shock of you just doing that all of a sudden..."

Now it was your turn to fidget nervously. Alice giggled before bending down to give you a kiss.

"Want to be carried anywhere else now, Tom?" She said, once again returning to her Genki Girl personality.

"If you can catch me!" You said on impulse, and before she could react you started running as fast as you could.

"Get back here Tom!" She shouted playfully before running after you as she began the chase.

As you navigated past the parking lot, into the streets, and past rows of houses you noted the conspicuous absence of any other people. You stole a glance behind you and realized that Alice was catching up. In the real world you were faster then she was (at least when you were trying to be fast), but in this world she could control everything. She could become as fast as she wanted to be, and although you didn't seem to tire even after sprinting at full speed for several minutes, eventually her hands grabbed onto your sides and you were lifted right off the ground.

"Gotcha, Tom!" She yelled triumphantly as she started spinning you around and hugging you tightly.

Placing you down on the pavement, she still held you in place.

"What do you want to do now, Tom? And make sure that whatever it is will be fun!" She said, with her eyes staring deeply inside of you.

info.brief_description: You and your girlfriend decide to have some fun in virtual reality, but SHE is in control!
info.description:
<This story really isn't in any desperate need of additions anymore, but since it's pretty much my favorite story in my portfolio, I'm still willing to reward chapters that I like with 100-500 GPs.>


(choice chapters are not included in the offer and you will not receive gift points for writing them.)


You and your girlfriend are on your way to the location of your next date. She plans to surprise you by taking you to her father's lab. When you arrive, she takes you into a room with a virtual reality system set up. When the two of you have arrived in the virtual world, you decide to have some fun with this dream-like world where ANYTHING is possible. After a while, however, you realize that your girlfriend is the one who is really in control of this cyber-world... and she wants to make the most of it!

Okay, so there's the basis of the story. It was actually inspired by this story here: http://gts-stories.blogspot.com/2007/10/virtual-giantess.html

Since its virtual reality, remember that the laws of physics don't apply. Both you and your girlfriend can control anything in the cyber-world, but your girlfriend's powers have priority over yours (ex: if you want to shrink her, but she doesn't want to be shrunken, she won't be). So basically, you can only alter stuff if she approves of what you want to do.

Feel free to take full advantage of the fact that it's all virtual. You can fly, shoot lasers out of your eyes, breath fire, grow as big as a planet... heck, you can even MAKE a planet if you want. You can also create virtual replicas of other people, so you can make a city of people for the characters to interact with (or just have another girl join in on playing with you after your girlfriend shrinks you). Remember that you can also modify the environment at will, and have fun. I will allow almost anything, but there are a few rules. No gender swapping girls into guys (guys into girls is okay), no futa stuff, no male giants without an equally big or bigger giantess by his side, and no gay stuff (lesbian is okay. sorry if you think this is unfair).

I would like the focus to be mostly giantess themed, but feel free to include other themes as well.


In order to improve the reading experience, I'll try to correct any spelling and grammar mistakes I find. I also reserve the right to make minor alterations to chapters if it is necessary to insert detail or correct one of the above rules being broken. If a chapter is too poorly written for me to fix, then it will be deleted. Chapters that I have to delete will not qualify for the GP reward.
